Summarized_Text: Danielle de Barbarac is 8 years old when her father, Auguste de Barbarac Jeroen Krabb, a wealthy 16th century french landowner, brings home his new wife, Baroness Rodmilla de Ghent Anjelica Huston and her two daughters Marguerite and Jacqueline. Danielle accidently meets the prince of France, Henry Dougray Scott when he steals a horse from their manor, while fleeing from the castle, pursued by the royal guard, in order to escape an arranged marriage and his parents restrictions. On returning it, the old man is discovered to be Leonardo da Vinci Patrick Godfrey, on his way to the royal court as artist in residence, and the painting the Mona Lisa. In returning the painting, Henry gives himself up to the Royal Guard. He returns the horse to the Manor, where he is greeted by the Baroness who introduces him to her daughters, particularly to Marguerite Megan Dodds, whom she hopes he will marry. While doing this, she meets Prince Henry again, this time dressed as a Lady, and delivers a spirited defence on behalf of the servants. Danielle discovers them, and to cover up what they were doing, the Baroness gives permission for her to attend the ball. Danielle goes for a swim, but bumps into Da Vinci, who is trying to walk on the water, and once more meets the Prince, who is delighted to see her. Marguerite attends a tennis match between Prince Henry and the Marquis de Limoges, and catches the ball. After he is gone, the Prince and Marguerite walk past Danielles stall, but Danielle avoids him by throwing a chicken at him.

Name: fear and loathing in las vegas
Summarized_Text: No more of that talk or Ill put the fucking leeches on you, understand? Gonzo suggests Guy Lombardo and his Royal Canadians. In the car, theyre still laughing. Duke theorizes that this is the main nerve of the American Dream.   He threatens Duke with a knife if he doesnt kill him when the song White Rabbit peaks. Back in the real world, Duke panics and starts packing to go back to LA. Gonzo tells him that he looks like hes about to explode. Lets get down to brass tacks.

Name: half baked
Summarized_Text: Thurgood Dave Chappelle, Scarface Guillermo Diaz, Brian Jim Breur and Kenny Harland Williams are childhood friends who discover marijuana. During a smoke, they send Kenny to get food. The guys get a lift home by a hot Mary Jane Potman Rachel True, and Thurgood falls in love. Thurgood is given some medicinal marijuana by a scientist, and the guys decide to sell more of it to raise bail money. Meanwhile, Thurgood and Mary Jane go on a date, and Thurgood promises not to smoke. Thurgood tries to stay righteous as Brian and Scarface start spending their profits. When Mary Jane breaks up with Thurgood, he promises to stop smoking. Meanwhile, Samson, a rival drug dealer, discovers the guys and trashes their apartment. Thurgood offers to set up Samson. The cops honor the deal to release Kenny, and Thurgood reunites with Mary Jane, giving up pot for good.

Name: i still know what you did last summer
Summarized_Text: Julie James had just spent a harrowing summer running for her life and dealing with the brutal murders of Helen Shivers and Barry Cox, by a vengeful fisherman named Ben Willis. Estes leads them to a graveyard site where Ben Willis family is buried, and there is one tombstone that has Julies name, and the years written on it in blood, with an open hole, where Ben plans to dump her body in after he kills her. Will Benson is in fact Ben Willis son, and he drags Julie away from the others after killing Estes, Tyrell and Nancy. Will takes Julie to his familys graveyard and introduces Julie to his father, Ben Willis. Julie didnt know Will was related to Ben Willis. Ray arrives just as Ben catches up with Julie and Will. In the fight between Ray and Will, Ben accidentally stabs his son with his own hook. Then Ben Willis is shot with Rays gun by Julie. Afterwards Ray and Julie are home, in their newlypurchased house. The film ends with Ben Willis grabbing Julie by the ankles and pulling her under her bed.

Name: lock stock and two smoking barrels
Summarized_Text: The two guns that Harry wanted, however, were the ones that Gary and Dean sold prematurely to Nick after the robbery. The neighbors heist goes underway Dog, the leader of the gang, learned of the weed chemists from one of the members, and uses his connections to the group to catch them off guard. Rory interrogates Nick into revealing where the four friends live, and uses one of the chemists to identify the robbers. That same morning, Dog has become furious at having been cheated and, during a tirade, he launches one of his men into a wall, who discovers through the hole he makes as a result various sound recording equipment Dog realizes that his neighbors were the ones who robbed him, and has the men prepare to ambush the friends in the flat as he takes the antique shotguns and counts the money. Gary and Dean call Nick, who in frustration directs them to the same address in their search for the antique shotguns, while Big Chris and his son depart to collect the debt, and the four friends drive home from the bar. Dog is mugged by Big Chris of the shotguns and money during his escape, Gary and Dean stealthily follow Big Chris, and the four friends finally return to the flat, shocked by the carnage and the missing loot. Big Chris then gives the guns and cash to Harry, and as he returns to his car he encounters Dog threatening his son, who wants him to get the loot back from Harry. Big Chris then crashes into their car to disable Dog, and after brutalizing him with his car door, he takes the debt money back from the unconscious friends, only to find his employer dead, and Tom just about to make off with the antique shotguns, which hed briefly paused to examine. After Tom leaves, Big Chris arrives to bid them farewell, and gives them a catalog on antique guns. Big Chris then leaves, having kept the debt money for himself and his son.

Name: meet joe black
Summarized_Text: Bill finally realizes that the young man is the personification of death. As his last birthday arrives, Bill makes a last attempt to demonstrate to Joe the meaning of true love and all it encompasses, especially honesty and sacrifice. Bill makes a last attempt to demonstrate to Joe the meaning of true love and all it encompasses especially honesty and sacrifice. Joe comes to understand that his love for Susan means he has to sacrifice his desire to take Susan with him and allow her to live her life, and he abandons his plans to take her. Joe helps get Bill reinstated as Chairman of the Board. Joe takes Bill over the bridge and the two disappear. Death has left with Bill. Joe is now the young man Susan met at the coffee shop at the start of the movie. In sorrow, she realises that Joe Death has left and she is now talking with Joe young man at coffee shop. She gazes past Joes shoulder at the spot where she last saw Joe Death and Bill.

Name: out of sight
Summarized_Text: Foley distracts Karen long enough for Buddy to grab her from behind and they throw her in the trunk of her car Foley crawls in after her. They put Karen in the car with Glenn Buddy and Foley talk for a few minutes about what to do with Karen. Buddy and Jack return to Miami and go to Buddys apartment. Karen had been unconscious for a brief time and recounts to her boss, Burdon, what happened in the car with Glenn, Karen, remembering Glenn from a previous prisoner transfer, had persuaded Glenn to leave Buddy and Foley behind. At Buddys apartment, Jack goes through the contents of Karens purse, finding a picture of her father. Chino finds Adeles apartment and goes there, however, Karen has gotten there first and asks Adele if she knows of Jacks whereabouts. Jack and Buddy case Ripleys house. Jack has Buddy retrieve them and take them out to the van, believing they can slip away before Maurice finds them. He tells Buddy to take the diamonds and go. Jack, not wanting to go back to prison, wants Karen to kill him but she refuses, shooting Jack in the leg.

Name: pleasantville
Summarized_Text: Jennifer is concerned mainly with her appearance, relationships and popularity, while David watches a lot of television, has few friends, and is socially awkward. The twins begin to fight over the use of the downstairs TV Jennifer wants to watch an MTV concert with her date, Mark Davis, while David hopes to watch a marathon of his favorite show, Pleasantville. A mysterious TV repairman Don Knotts shows up uninvited, and quizzes David on Pleasantville before giving him a strangelooking, retrostyled remote control. The repairman leaves, and David and Jennifer promptly resume fighting. However, through some mechanism of the remote control, they are transported into the television, ending up in the Parkers black and white Pleasantville living room. Jennifer is dismayed to be stranded, but she and David begin exposing the town to issues such as sex, personal freedoms, styles of art, and literature. While the mayor is concerned, people in Pleasantville begin to explore hidden abilities and revel in their new freedoms. The town fathers, who see the changes as eating away at the towns moral values, remain unchanged. He finds his mother crying in the kitchen, distraught over her life and her failed relationship. Betty is seen sitting next to George on a park bench.

Name: practical magic
Summarized_Text: When Maria, the witch ancestor of our protagonists, realizes that her lover is never going to come for her, she casts a spell on herself to never fall in love again. Unfortunately, the spell goes awry and becomes a family curse any man that falls for an Owens woman will die. But one night when they witness their aunts casting a love spell for a neighbor, Sally decides she will never fall in love and dreams up a man that will never exist.  The next thing you know, Sally is happily married to Michael Mark Feuerstein with two daughters of her very own. Her sister, in the mean time, has been living in Florida where life is constant parties. It is his accidental death that makes them toy with nature hoping to bring him back so they wont be arrested. Which only becomes a bigger problem when an officer comes looking for Jimmy with a letter Sally had written to Gilly. Because a woman has turned up dead and naked. Hes possessing Gilly and the only way to save her is to form a coven and banish him.

Name: ronin
Summarized_Text: Vincent asks Sam why he took the job and Sam tells him he needs the money. Gregor attempts to sell the case to the Russians but when his contact pulls a gun, he shoots the Russian contact and kills him. A tense standoff and hectic gun fight follows as Deirdre, Sam, and Vincent attempt to capture Gregor while the Russians try to kill them. They escape with Deirdre at the wheel just as Sam and Vincent emerge from the coliseum. Vincent asks JeanPierre to help him locate Gregor, Deirdre and Seamus. Seamus and Deirdre escort Gregor to the post office where they retrieve the case, and they are ambushed by Vincent and Sam. At the meeting, Mikhi exchanges money for the case when Gregor, prepared to leave, reveals that he has positioned a sniper somewhere in the arena that will shoot Natacha if Gregor is betrayed before he can leave safely. Vincent and Sam follow the crowd out of the arena in time to see Seamus, disguised as an arena security guard, ambush and shoot Mikhi and his bodyguard before stealing the case. Sam and Vincent confront Seamus, but are momentarily distracted by the security guards, and Seamus shoots Vincent. He asks Sam what was in the case.

Name: rounders
Summarized_Text: Gifted poker player Mike McDermott Matt Damon loses his entire 30,000 bankroll in a hand of Texas holdem against Teddy KGB John Malkovich, a Russian mobster who runs an illegal underground poker room. Shaken, Mike decides to concentrate on law school, while promising his girlfriend and fellow law student Jo Gretchen Mol not to play the game anymore. When Worm is given a fiveday deadline to pay off his debt, Mike joins him in a furious race to earn the money. After this, Worm decides to leave the city, and he advises Mike to do the same. This is when he reveals to Mike that his debt is owed to KGB, the same Russian mobster who cleaned Mike out of his 30,000 bankroll several months before. Infuriated, Mike cuts ties with Worm once and for all. In a race against time to pay off Worms debt, Mike gets his shot at redemption by placing his life on the line against the man who forced him out of the game. With the help of a 10,000 loan from his law school professor Petrovsky Martin Landau, Mike sits down to play KGB in a no limit, headsup game of Texas Holdem. In two heated headsup matches, Mike beats KGB, winning enough to pay off Worms debt, repay his loan to the professor, and regain his original bankroll of about 30,000. The movie ends with Mike officially dropping out of law school, saying goodbye to Jo, and going to Las Vegas to play in the World Series of Poker Main Event.

Name: rushmore
Summarized_Text: Max crassly tells Magnus that half the reason he was expelled was because he got a handjob from Mrs.  Calloway in the back of her car. After being bailed out by his father, Max attempts to get Ms.  Cross fired from Rushmore by showing Dr.  Guggenheim photos of her and Blume together, but finds out she had already resigned. Dirk also brings the news that Dr.  Guggenheim is in the hospital after suffering a stroke, and that Max should visit him. Blume, who is an outward mess, tells Max that Ms.  Cross had ended the relationship. Max leaves through the window, finally accepting that he will never win Ms.  Cross. Max signals the DJ, who begins to play The Faces Ooh La La as Max and Ms.  Cross approach the dance floor together.

Name: saving private ryan
Summarized_Text: One of the women typing discovers three letters for three men from the same family. The father insists the squad take his young daughter to safety Miller refuses but Caparzo steps out from cover to take her, against orders. From another private being treated for a leg wound, also from the 101st, the squad learns that the Airbornes rallying point is nearby and that Ryan may have gone there. Miller accepts that men die in combat for the greater good. Miller has his men go through them looking for Ryan. The man tells him that Ryan was assigned to a mixed unit thats guarding a bridge across the Merderet River in the nearby village of Ramelle. Miller cant change Ryans mind. The halftrack they destroyed was part of a German probe to investigate the forces guarding the bridge so the unit knows the Germans will mount a large assault. Henderson is killed and then Mellish is attacked by a German soldier Mac Steinmeier who overpowers him in handtohand combat, slowly driving a bayonet into Mellishs chest. An American flag backlighted by the afternoon sun gently flaps in the breeze.

Name: shakespeare in love
Summarized_Text: After learning that his love was cheating on him with his patron, Shakespeare burns his new comedy, Romeo and Ethel the Pirates Daughter, rewriting it as the tragedy Romeo and Juliet. A young man named Thomas Kent is cast in the role after impressing Shakespeare with his performance and his love of Shakespeares previous work. After Shakespeare discovers his stars true identity, he and Viola begin a passionate secret affair. When Viola is summoned to the court of Queen Elizabeth I Judi Dench, Shakespeare dons a womans disguise to accompany her as her cousin. If Romeo and Juliet is a success, Shakespeare as playwright will win the money. Left without a stage or lead actor, it seems that Romeo and Juliet must close before it even opens, until Richard Burbage Martin Clunes, the owner of a competing theatre, the Curtain, offers his stage to Shakespeare. Shakespeare assumes the lead role of Romeo, with a boy actor Daniel Brocklebank, playing Juliet. Viola replaces him and plays Juliet to Shakespeares Romeo. Although she recognizes Viola, the Queen does not unmask her, instead declaring that the role of Juliet is being performed by Thomas Kent. The Queen also states that Romeo and Juliet has accurately portrayed true love so Wessex must pay Shakespeare 50, the exact amount Shakespeare requires to buy a share in the Lord Chamberlains Men.

Name: sliding doors
Summarized_Text: She and James fall in love despite Helens reservations about beginning another relationship so soon after her ugly breakup with Gerry. Gerry conceals his infidelity and juggles the two women in his life Lydia even interacts with Helen on several occasions. Helen has a number of conflicts with Gerry, then discovers shes pregnant with his baby, but delays telling him. In the first timeline, Helen discovers shes pregnant, believing it is with James child, and goes to see him at his office. After she and James declare their love for another, Helen walks out into the road and is hit by a car. In the second timeline, Helen tells Gerry she has a job interview with an international PR firm. Thinking Helen is at the interview, Gerry sees Lydia, who is also pregnant with his child. Helen is there, and is stunned when Lydia tells her she cant do the interview because shes deciding whether or not to keep your boyfriends baby. In both timelines, after her accident hit by a car in the first timeline, and falling down the stairs in the second Helen goes to hospital and happens to end up in the very same emergency room in both timelines, and loses her baby. This mirrors the start of the film, where James picks up Helens earring on the elevator after Helen is fired from her job.

Name: small soldiers
Summarized_Text: Alan and Christy later lock up the store and part ways, while the Gorgonite leader called Archer voiced by Frank Langella hides in Alans backpack. The next day, at Archers direction, Alan finds the remains of one destroyed Gorgonite Troglokhan, but no sign of the Commando Elite or the remaining Gorgonites. Alan and Archer headhome on Alans bike, but are closely followed by the Commando Elite. After reparing Brick, Chip notes Alans House and orders the Commando Elite to move in. Alan awakens, saves Archer, drives off the Commando Elite, and jams Commando Nick Nitro into the garbage disposal, destroying him from the knees down. Alan, furious at Archer for not supporting him, demands why he did not speak up to prove to his parents that the toys are alive, to which Archer responds by repeating Alans earlier command to shut up. Alan worries that he will suffer losses of others trust if the Gorgonites have been destroyed, whereupon Archer replies that the Gorgonites must be alive, because the Commandos are still seeking them. The Commandos blast their way out of the garage on their vehicles and pursue Christy, Alan, and Archer, who escape on Christys motor scooter. Chip then hijacks a shipment of new Commando Elite figures by forcing the driver to Alans house. The Gorgonites survive by hiding beneath a fallen satellitesignal receiver and are discovered later by Alan.

Name: species ii
Summarized_Text: Senator Ross indicates that he is aware of Patricks behavior and tells him to focus on his political goals. Unable to find Patrick, they pursue the other astronauts, Anne Sampas and Dennis Gamble. Dennis witnesses this and tells Press and Laura what he saw, remembering what happened in the capsule and joining them in their mission. Patrick demands Laura open Eves cell and nearly kills her when she refuses, but Press and Dennis drive him off with a special gaseous weapon. Patricks human side briefly returns, but while he tearfully embraces his father, the alien DNA suddenly violently reasserts itself and kills the Senator. While they plan to weaponize this weakness, Eve breaks out of her confinement to find Patrick. Patrick attempts to attack the team, but Press impales the male alien in the back with a pitchfork coated in Dennis blood, causing him to disintegrate and die. The military escorts Press, Laura and the injured Dennis away. Eves seemingly lifeless body is loaded into an ambulance, but shortly after, her womb begins to swell rapidlyindicating her survival and impregnation by Patrick  while Portus, who somehow survived, watches. As the screen cuts to black, Eves uterus bursts and her screaming is heard.

Name: stepmom
Summarized_Text: Isabel tries very hard to make Anna and Ben feel comfortable and happy with her, but Anna repeatedly rejects her overtures while Ben, who is generally kind to Isabel, adds extra complication with his mischievous nature. After a long string of arguments and hurt feelings involving Isabel, Jackie and Anna, Luke proposes to Isabel, making her Anna and Bens soontobe official stepmom. Jackie and Isabel clash repeatedly, largely over Isabels parenting. However, they manage to establish a shaky truce, as both Jackie and Isabel come to terms with the fact that Isabel will soon step into the role of surrogate mother. The two women finally bond when Isabel reveals her admiration of Jackies maternal instincts, while Jackie in turn praises Isabels hipness as a means to connect with Anna. Isabel finally lets her guard down when she tearfully tells Jackie her biggest fear is that on Annas wedding day, all Anna will wish for is her mothers presence. Jackie explains to Isabel that, while Jackie will always have their past, Isabel will have their future. Jackie, bedridden from her illness, is visited in her room by Ben and Anna. Later that day, Isabel is taking a family picture of Luke and Jackie with their children. Jackie demonstrates her acceptance of Isabel by inviting her to join them in the portrait, stating lets get a photo with the whole family.

Name: the big lebowski
Summarized_Text: Bewildered, Dude convinces them that they have the wrong person as hes not married and cant possibly possess the amount of money theyre asking. Dude agrees to meet with the Big Lebowski, hoping to get compensation for his rug since it really tied the room together and figures that his wife, Bunny, shouldnt be owing money around town. He quickly picks one out and, as its being loaded into Dudes car, he speaks to a young blonde woman Tara Reid poolside who is painting her toenails green. He shows Dude a crude note describing Bunnys kidnapping and the demand for 1 million. The Dude is brought to a huge loft studio filled with canvases and minimal illumination.  Walter resolves to go to Plan B he tells Larry to watch out the window as he and Dude go back out to the car where Donny is waiting. Dude tells him that Larry Sellers should have the money, though Treehorn is not convinced. Maude gives him an allowance but his weakness is vanity Hence the slut. Despite his protests, Walter and Dude walk past him into the study where a sternlooking Lebowski sits.

Name: the faculty
Summarized_Text: The following morning, the films six protagonist students are introduced. They witness Coach Willis and Ms.  Olsen assault the school nurse, Ms.  Harper Salma Hayek by forcing one of the creatures into her ear. Zeke takes the five to his house where he examines and experiments with Caseys specimen. Zeke makes everyone take some of his drug to prove they are human and unaffected. She explains that she is taking over Earth because her own planet is dying. Casey returns to the locker room and finds Stokely and Zeke alive. Casey begins dating Delilah and has been considered a local hero.

Name: the man in the iron mask
Summarized_Text: Aramis reveals that Philippe was sent away by his father, King Louis XIII, to save France from dynastic warfare. Athos, Porthos, and Aramis teach Philippe how to act like royalty, so he may replace Louis as king. Afterwards, DArtagnan is stunned to learn that Philippe is Louis brother and pleads with Louis to spare his life, joined by the twins mother, who Louis is furious and upset to see had known about the plot. Athos, Porthos, and Aramis brush off their old musketeer uniforms, becoming The Three Musketeers again and, with DArtagnans help, break into the Bastille prison and escape with Philippe. Philippe knocks Louis down and begins to strangle him, but DArtagnan, with his dying breaths, reminds Philippe that Louis is his brother. Saying the musketeer call, DArtagnan dies as Philippe comments that DArtagnan was the one wearing the mask all along. DArtagnans righthand man, Lieutenant Andre, is furious at Louis for killing DArtagnan and upon finding out Philippe was brother to Louis and of royal blood, orders his men to close the door and swears them to secrecy. By the time another battalion breaks in, the three Musketeers and Lieutenant Andre have made Louis and Philippe swap clothes and locked Louis in the iron mask. Posing as the king, Philippe orders the guards to take Louis and lock him away. Philippe, Athos, Porthos, Aramis, and Queen Anne attend DArtagnans funeral, in which The Three Musketeers are finally redeemed.

Name: the mask of zorro
Summarized_Text: Montero imprisons DE la Vega and takes his infant daughter, Elena, as his own and leaves for Spain. He escapes from prison, and as he plans his revenge on Montero, DE la Vega encounters a thief, Alejandro Murrieta Antonio Banderas, who  along with his brother  greatly admired Zorro as a child and even had a small hand in the heros last great exploit. He challenges Alejandro to gain Monteros trust and pose as Don Alejandro Del Castillo y Garca, a visiting nobleman, with DE la Vega posing as his servant, Bernardo. Meanwhile, DE la Vega uses this opportunity to become closer to Elena still posing as Bernardo, he learns that Montero raised her telling her that her mother died in childbirth. De la Vega sends Alejandro, as Zorro, to steal the map leading to the gold mine he duels Montero, Love, and their guards at the hacienda. De la Vega tells Alejandro to release the workers on his own so that he can reclaim Elena he corners Montero at his hacienda and reveals his identity, but is captured. She releases DE la Vega from his cell and they proceed to the mine, which Zorro has begun to infiltrate. De la Vega stops Montero from shooting Zorro and the two duel. In the end, Alejandro avenges his brother by impaling Love with his own sword, and DE la Vega sends Montero to his death by dragging him off a cliff behind a gold laden cart which crushes Love. Elena and Alejandro free the workers before the explosives go off, where they attend to the mortally wounded DE la Vega.

Name: the parent trap
Summarized_Text: After the birth of their twin daughters, Annie and Hallie Lindsay Lohan, Nick and Elizabeth divorce and lose contact, each parent raising one of the twins without telling her about her sister. Annie, pretending to be Hallie, goes to California to meet her father, the Parker familys housekeeper, Chessy Lisa Ann Walter, their dog Sammy, and Nicks young, opportunistic fiance, Meredith Blake Elaine Hendrix, who is only interested in Nicks money. Distressed by Merediths deviousness, Annie telephones Hallie and persuades her to bring Elizabeth to California to break up the engagement. To bring Nick and Elizabeth together, Hallie, Annie, Chessy, Martin, and Charles conspire to have them meet at a hotel in San Francisco by arranging for Nick to meet Merediths parents and by not telling Elizabeth about Meredith. Nervous about meeting Nick, Elizabeth asks Martin to accompany Hallie and her. Elizabeth coaxes Meredith into camping with Nick and the girls in her place, while she stays behind at the Parker residence. Nick chooses the girls over Meredith and breaks off the engagement. Later, out of earshot of the girls, Nick asks Elizabeth to Remind me to thank them one day. However, when Annie and Elizabeth get home, they find Hallie and Nick waiting for them, having flown there on the Concorde. Elizabeth is fearful of remarrying, but she yields to Nicks unwavering confidence, and Hallie and Annie look on happily as their parents embrace.

Name: the prince of egypt
Summarized_Text: Moses sister, Miriam, having followed the basket, sees this and prays that someday Moses will come back to deliver them from slavery. Moses asks Pharaoh why he is so hard on Rameses, especially since he knows Moses is the most responsible for the damage. He is intercepted by Rameses, who grabs him and asks him whats going on. Moses manages to drive the bandits away by sending their camels on the run, but in his exhaustion, he falls down the well by chance. However, Jethro refuses to believe his claim, referring to how Moses helped get all his daughters out of perilous situations. However, the voice commands Moses to go forth, promising to smite Egypt with His wonders when Pharaoh will not listen. Upon reaching the palace, Moses finds that his father and mother, presumably is dead, and Rameses has become the new Pharoah, married with a son of his own. The two brothers greet each other jovially, with Rameses eager to welcome Moses back, forgiving the events that drove him away and seemingly ignoring his Hebrew origins. He returns the royal ring that Rameses had given him so long ago. Disheartened, Moses leaves and instructs the slaves to mark lambs blood above their doors for protection.

Name: the thin red line
Summarized_Text: On deck, battalion commander Lieutenant Colonel Gordon Tall Nick Nolte talks with his commanding officer, Brigadier General Howard Quintard John Travolta, about the invasion and its importance with Tall personally going ashore with C Company while Quintard will remain on the ship. Tall orders Staros over a field telephone to take the bunker by frontal assault, at whatever cost.  Bell reports back that there are five machine guns in the bunker. He joins another small detachment of men, led by Captain John Gaff John Cusack, on a flanking mission to take the bunker. To buy time for Private Fife to go back and inform the rest of the unit and Coombs top escape downriver, Witt draws the Japanese away but is eventually encircled by one of their squads, who demand that he surrender. Witts dead body is later found and buried by Welsh and his squad mates. Bell and the rest of the surviving members of C Company board a waiting LCT which evacuates them from Guadalcanal.

Name: the truman show
Summarized_Text: Truman and Lauren run towards the beach where they are able to share a moment of privacy. Truman tries to explain to Marlon what he just experienced but Marlon passes it off as Truman trying to be funny. When he returns home, Truman finds Meryl and his mother looking at photos in an old album. Truman goes to a travel agency the next day to book a flight to Fiji but the agent Judy Clayton tells him that there are no available flights for at least a month. She goes to the car and sits with him but he tells her to be silent before predicting the appearance of every person along the street as if they were on a fixed schedule  specifically, a lady on a red bike, a man with flowers, and a vintage Volkswagen beetle with a dented fender. However, Truman is forced to stop at the bridge when he realizes that he cant drive over because of his fear of water. Marlon then tells Truman the real reason he stopped by and took him out tonight. A caller rings in and Christof accepts to answer questions. He gets off of the boat and examines the wall, following it a short ways until he finds a short staircase leading to an exit door.

Name: the waterboy
Summarized_Text: Bobby then approaches Coach Klein Henry Winkler of the South Central Louisiana State University Mud Dogs and asks to work as the teams waterboy. Bobbys mother, Helen, determined to keep him on a tight leash tells Bobby of the evils of football and forbids him to play. After being picked on again by his new team, Coach Klein encourages Bobby to strike back, which leads to him knocking out the teams quarterback. Coach Klein convinces Bobby to enroll as a student at SCLSU and play for the team, which he agrees to do as long as nobody tells his mother. However, after Bobby invites Vicki to his trailer where he introduces her to his mother at a cookout, Helen forbids Bobby from seeing her again. Coach Beaulieu reveals that Bobby never finished high school, making him ineligible for college and football. Arriving at halftime of the Bourbon Bowl with Helen and Vicki, Bobby manages to encourage the losing Mud Dogs to make a comeback. With Bobbys help, Coach Klein overcomes his fear of Red Beaulieu by imagining him as something hes not afraid ofi. During the final play, Bobby throws a touchdown pass and the Mud Dogs win the Bourbon Bowl. Bobby is named the MVP of the game.

Name: the wedding singer
Summarized_Text: Noting Robbies handling of the situation inside the wedding, Julia wants him to sing at her wedding, to which Robbie happily agrees to. Eventually, Robbie and Lindas wedding day arrives, and everyone is there, except for Linda. Julia meets with Robbie afterwards, hoping that hell still play for her and Glenns wedding. After the festivities, Julia asks Robbie if hell help her plan her wedding. Robbie eventually goes out for a party with Holly, Julia, and Julias fiance, Glenn. Robbie attempts to punch Glenn, but gets hit instead. nMeanwhile, Robbie awakes to find Linda, who says she can adapt to being the wife of a wedding singer, but Robbie explains that he doesnt want to marry her. Robbie attends another wedding the same day, and runs into Holly, who explains that Julia is going to Las Vegas. After pressuring Sammy for help, Robbie gets a plane ticket in First Class, unaware that he is on the same plane as Julia and Glenn who are in Coach Class. Robbie finally expresses his true feelings to Julia through a song, and eventually, the two are married.

Name: urban legend
Summarized_Text: Later that day, Natalie, Brenda, Paul, Parker, Sasha, and Damon meet where they discuss the murder. Natalie goes to the campus security office and tells Reese about the killing, but when the both arrive at the scene, the body and Damons car are gone. Natalie and Paul run into the creepylooking janitor where they ask him questions about the Stanley Hall Massacre and the janitor tells them to talk to Wexler. Later, Natalie walks into the campus swimming pool where Brenda is doing laps when she thinks she sees the killer approach. Reese goes off to find the killer on her own. Natalie runs into Paul outside her doom room and becomes suspicious to where he went during the time Sasha was killed. While Paul goes to a phone to call the police, Brenda and Natalie notice a strange odor and upon opening the car truck, discover the dead and mangled body of Professor Wexler.  Brenda befriended Natalie this whole time to torment her with this urban legends as her insane way of getting even with her. Just then, Paul appears applauding Brenda for her revenge plan and offers wanting a part of it for the credit for his career.

Name: vampires
Summarized_Text: Only Jack, Katrina, and Jacks partner Montoya Daniel Baldwin manage to escape. With only three slayers and as many as 30 vampires, Jack, Montoya, and Guiteau have their work cut out for them. As the day wears on, Guiteau lures out the vampires, Jack shoots stakes into their chests from his crossbow, and Montoya drives the winch that pulls the vampires out into the sun where they burn up. Montoya and Katrina escape in the jeep, Guiteau hides behind a counter in a restaurant, finding a shotgun, but Valek catches Jack and ties him up. The vampires tie Jack to a cross and Alba begins by slicing Jacks leg, collecting the blood, and passing it to Valek to drink. With no priest to finish the ritual, Valek tries to force Guiteau to do it, but Guiteau turns the gun on himself. In the final scene, knowing that they have more vampires to kill, Montoya finally admits to Jack that hes been bitten twice by Katrina, who is lying in the back of the truck in order to stay out of the sun. Guiteau tries to kill Montoya, but Jack steps between them. Knowing that Montoya was first bitten two days ago but still saved his life in the fight with the vampires, Jack figures he owes Montoya two days. The soontobeturned vamp Montoya and the vampire Katrina drive away while Jack and Guiteau stay behind to clean up the town of the surviving vampires before pursing them.

Name: what dreams may come
Summarized_Text: Albert explains to Chris that this is a sign that the couple are truly soul mates. Albert agrees to find Chris a tracker who takes the form of Sigmund Freud to help find Annies soul. On the journey to Hell, Chris finds himself recalling his son, Ian. Remembering how hed called him the one man hed want at his side to brave Hell, Chris realizes Albert is Ian. Before they part ways, Ian begs Chris to remember how he saved his marriage following Ian and Maries deaths. All that Chris can reasonably expect is a chance to say a final farewell to Annie. Unable to stir her memories, he gives up, but not the way the Tracker hoped he would he chooses to join Annie forever in Hell. Chris and Annie are reunited with their children in Heaven, whose original appearances are restored. Chris proposes reincarnation, so that he and Annie can experience life together all over again. The film ends with Chris and Annie meeting again as young children in a situation roughly parallel to their first meeting.

Name: wild things
Summarized_Text: During the trial, Suzie reveals that Sam did not rape her and that Kelly fabricated the charges because she was in love with him and angry that he slept with her mother. It is then revealed that Sam, Kelly, and Suzie orchestrated the scandal with the aim of taking the money from the trial. After Kelly has an affair with Suzie, Sam and Kelly take her to the seaside, where Sam murders Suzie with a wine bottle. Ray discovers Sam is the killer and goes to Kellys house to protect Kelly from Sam. In the confrontation between Kelly and Ray, both are shot, Kelly fatally. Sam goes to his room and finds Ray there  Ray and Sam had been collaborating the whole time. They later go cruising in Sams boat in the ocean, where Sam knocks Ray overboard. Sam would say you should not have killed Kelly, signifying he and Suzie showed no remorse in having to kill Ray. Suzie also wanted to kill Ray in revenge for killing her friend, Davie, some time ago Davie tried to intervene to protect a prostitute that Ray was roughing up, so Ray killed him, then busted Suzie for drugs and sent her away to a correctional facility so she couldnt be a witness against him. As for Kellys death, Ray shot her first and then put a gun in her hand and made it appear that she had shot at him.

Name: youve got mail
Summarized_Text: There, using the screen name Shopgirl, she reads an email from NY152, the screen name of Joe Fox Tom Hanks. Joe and Kathleen have a friendly conversation that reveals Kathleens fears about the Fox Books store opening around the corner, shocking Joe. However, at a publishing party later in the week, Joe and Kathleen meet again, both of them being in the New York book business, where Kathleen discovers Joes true identity. Following suggestions from Frank and Joe via NY152 Kathleen begins a media war, including both a boycott of Fox Books and an interview on the local news. All the while, NY152 and Shopgirl continue their courtship, to the point where NY152 asks Shopgirl to meet. Meanwhile Kevin, looking in a cafe window at the behest of Joe, discovers the true identity of Shopgirl. When Joe discovers that it is actually Kathleen behind the name, he confronts her as Joe concealing his NY152 alter ego  and feelings. During this time, Joe as NY152 provides careful advice to Kathleen as Shopgirl, gently encouraging her to explore her reallife relationship with Joe as himself. Finally, NY152 and Shopgirl agree to meet for the first time since NY152 apparently stood her up. Kathleen admits that she had wanted NY152 to be Joe so badly, and the two kiss.

Name: 10 things i hate about you
Summarized_Text: When Cameron asks Bianca out, she informs him of her fathers new rule and, as a pretense for allowing her to date Joey, suggests that Cameron find someone willing to date Kat. Michael assists by convincing Joey to pay Patrick to take out Kat, under the pretense that this will allow Joey to date Bianca. At the party, Kat becomes upset when she sees Bianca with Joey, and responds by getting drunk. Meanwhile, Bianca ignores Cameron in favor of Joey, leaving Cameron dejected. Joey offers to pay Patrick to take Kat to the prom so he can take Bianca. They go on a date which turns romantic, but Kat becomes suspicious and angry when Patrick insists that she go with him to the prom, an event she is adamantly against. Bianca is irritated that Cameron hasnt asked her to the prom, and so accepts Joeys invitation, but Walter wont allow it unless Kat goes too. Bianca insists that she can make her own choices, so Kat agrees to go to the prom with Patrick, and Bianca decides to go with Cameron instead of Joey. Angry that Bianca has spurned him for Cameron, Joey reveals his arrangement with Patrick, which causes Kat to leave heartbroken. Joey then punches Cameron but is in turn beaten up by Bianca for having hurt her, Kat, and Cameron.

Name: 8mm
Summarized_Text: Private investigator Tom Welles is contacted by Daniel Longdale, attorney for wealthy widow Mrs.  Christian, whose husband has recently died. In Hollywood, with the help of an adult video store employee called Max California, Tom penetrates the underworld of illegal pornography. Velvet and Machine produce a bound and beaten Max, whom they abducted to force Tom to bring them the only surviving copy of the illegal film. Once he delivers it, but before he turns it over, they kill Max and beat Tom and then burn the film. In an ensuing fight, Velvet and Longdale are both killed Tom wounds Machine and escapes. He calls Mrs.  Christian to tell her his discoveries and recommends going to the police, to which she agrees. Tom decides to seek justice for the murdered girl by killing the remaining people involved. He calls Mrs.  Mathews to tell her about her daughter and asks for her permission to punish those responsible.

Name: american beauty
Summarized_Text: Lester immediately develops an obvious infatuation with Angela, much to his daughters embarrassment. Col.  Fitts, concerned over the growing relationship between Lester and Ricky, roots through his sons possessions, finding footage of Lester working out in the nude captured by chance while Ricky was filming Jane through her bedroom window slowly bringing him to the incorrect conclusion that his son is gay. As evening falls, Ricky returns home to find his father waiting for him with fists and vitriol, having mistaken his drug rendezvous with Lester for a sexual affair. Realizing this as an opportunity for freedom, Ricky falsely agrees that he is gay and goads his violent father until he is thrown out. Ricky shoots her down with her deepest fear that she is boring and completely ordinary and uses her friends, like Jane, to boost her public image. Fitts, shamed and broken, wanders back into the rain. Meanwhile, Carolyn sits alone in her car on the side of the road, holding her gun and becoming more and more infuriated at the days turn of events. A gunshot rings out Angela hears it in the bathroom. Lester is found by Jane and Ricky. Despite his death, Lester, from his vantage point as narrator, is contentI guess I could be really pissed off about what happened to me.

Name: american pie
Summarized_Text: Oz is humiliated by an older girl, Finch is too late for the party and Jim attempts to talk to Czechoslovakian exchange student Nadia Shannon Elizabeth, but fails completely. Kevin decides to take a stand and defiantly declares that the four will make a pact, to lose their virginity before the school prom and graduation. Kevin finally seizes a chance to make things up with Vicky, and performs oral sex on her in her bedroom using his new techniques. Upon Nadias arrival, Jim sets up the webcam and dashes across the street to join Kevin and Finch at Kevins house. Against expectation, an almostnaked Nadia discovers Jims pornography collection and begins to passionately masturbate on his bed, causing a riotous reaction from Stifler, Kevin and Finch on the other end, as well as Stiflers young brother Matt Eli Marienthal. Kevin and Finch force Jim to go back and seduce her while the moment lasts, which ends with Nadia forcing Jim to strip and dance for her while she reads his pornography. A desperate Jim pleads for Nadia not to go and wins her around, but when Nadia takes her panties off, he involuntarily ejaculates again upon touching her clitoris. The next day, Jim has become the laughing stock of the entire high school and is left despondent and depressed, especially upon hearing that Nadia has been immediately sent back home to Czechoslovakia by her sponsors after the incident. Finch quickly becomes the most talkedabout and most aweinspiring senior in the whole school, with hordes of girls desperate to go to the prom with him. Later on, Kevin, Oz, Jim and Finch all go to their favorite hangout restaurant, the fittinglynamed Dog Years, for breakfast.

Name: any given sunday
Summarized_Text: During the first game shown, which is the thirteenth game of the season, both the starting quarterback Jack Cap Rooney Dennis Quaid and the secondstring quarterback Tyler Cherubini are injured and forced to leave the game due to poor offensive line play in blitz pickup. While the Sharks lose this game by a small margin, Beamen plays well and gains confidence. During the next game Beamen begins to get comfortable with the game and quickly learns the offense. Beaman begins to change the plays in the huddle, not realizing the disrespect this shows to his coaches. Beamen displays his raw athletic talent and starts to run and pass extremely successfully and leads the sharks to the playoffs after winning the last three of the last four games of the season, bringing the Sharks to 97 on the year. DAmato confronts Beamen to ask why he has been changing the plays, to which Beaman responds selfishly. After displaying to DAmato that Beamen is not capable of leading the team, DAmato tells Beamen that it is likely that Cap Rooney will probably be fit and available for the playoffs, demoting Beamen back to the bench. A rift forms between Beaman and DAmato after DAmato tells him just how far he still has to go to fulfill his potential and lead the team. After learning of his demotion he alienates the rest of the team, to the point that he gets his car sawed in half at a party, and the Sharks are blown out at home in a game that could have given the Sharks home field advantage in the playoffs. The final game sees Cap return to start as quarterback and he plays strongly until being injured by a hit.

Name: austin powers the spy who shagged me
Summarized_Text: At Dr.  Evils Seattle headquarters, Dr. Evil is unimpressed and unveils his latest evil planhe has developed a time machine to go back to the sixties and steal Austin Powers also Mike Myers mojo, a fluid inside his body thats the source of Austins skills and his sexual prowess. A disgruntled Scottish Guard with unusual eating habits called Fat Bastard again, Mike Myers has been hired to extract Austins mojo from his frozen body at the Ministry of Defence Cryo Chamber. However, at the same moment Scott Evil arrives through the time portal. Evil announces his latest plan to hold the United States and the whole world ransom by threatening to destroy Washington D. C. , and then additional major cities each hour, using a giant laser on the moon. Austin and Felicity arrive on the island but are apprehended. Evil initiates the selfdestruction mechanism of the moon base and escapes in his rocket after throwing the bottle of Austins mojo in the air. With seconds to spare they escape through the time portal to 1999.

Name: being john malkovich
Summarized_Text: Schwartz, realizing that he has been forsaken by both women, ties and locks up his wife, while he enters into Malkovichs mind and dates Maxine. From him, Lotte learns that Dr.  Lester is well aware of the portal and has been using it to live on for years after years, changing from one dying body to a younger one each time. When the body is ripe, the portal moves to its next host. At the present time, the portal is connected to the body of Malkovich, which is getting ripe soon. After a bar fight, Schwartz decides to leave Malkovichs body voluntarily. Malkovich finds he briefly has control of himself before Dr.  Lester and his friends enter the portal, just before the portal moves on to the next host. Later, an aging Malkovich, under the collective mind of Dr.  Lester and his friends, reveals to a now aged Sheen a plan to prolong their lives through Emily.

Name: big daddy
Summarized_Text: A lazy law school graduate adopts a kid to impress his girlfriend, but everything doesnt go as planned and he becomes the unlikely foster father. , Sonny Koufax is 32 years old. Hes a law school graduate and had a nice apartment in Manhattan. But after his fedup girlfriend leaves him, he comes up with the ingenious idea to adopt a fiveyearold boy to showcase his newfound maturity. But things dont go as planned, and he finds himself the unlikely foster father that will change his perspective on just looking out for himself. Dustin Burns, Sonny Koufax graduated from law school years ago but chose not to take the bar exam. One day his girlfriend decides that she has had enough and tells him that things must change or else its over. When his roommate, Kevin leaves, for China, a boy is dropped at their apartment and is told that he is Kevins son, but Kevin doesnt know his mother. Sonny takes care of him, and after spending time with him he decides to adopt him hoping that his girlfriend will be impressed. But when he learns that she has a new boyfriend, he tries to have the boy sent back to his mother but when he learns that she died and that he would be sent to an orphanage, he decides to take care of him.

Name: blast from the past
Summarized_Text: Blast From The Past is a romantic comedy about the fallout of falling in love. Brendan Fraser is Adam, a man out of time. Alicia Silverstone is Eve, a woman of her times. When these two polar opposites begin to attract, the result is a wondrous chain reaction. Her life has been a series of deadend jobs, shallow boyfriends and dashed hopes. When the timetriggered locks on the Webbers shelter at last open, Adam is sent out to replenish supplies and find a nice, nonmutant girl from Pasadena in order to repopulate the world with upstanding citizens. Adams hapless search in the brave new world of homeless people, adult book stores and allnight supermarkets leads him smack into Eve. At first, she just cant believe this guy who says Maam, thinks seersucker jackets are stylish, and has never seen color television, is for real.

Name: boys dont cry
Summarized_Text: Brandon goes to Falls City, Nebraska, home of Candace, Lotter and another friend, Tom Nissen Brendan Sexton III. Brandon stays at the home of Candace, who has a crush on Brandon. Brandon hangs out with Lotter, Nissen and Candace, and through them meets Candaces sister, Lana Tisdel Chlo Sevigny. Lana is from an unstable home, with a mother Jeanetta Arnette who loves to party during the day with Lotter and Nissen. Lotter reveals to Brandon that when he was in prison, Lana wrote him regularly. Lana later reveals that she was only 13 when Lotter was in prison. They find a newspaper that talks about the arrest of Teena Brandon, and show it to Lanas mother. Name: cruel intentions

Name: dogma

Name: lake placid
Summarized_Text: In Aroostook County, Maine, Fish and Game officer Walt Lawson is scuba diving in Black Lake when he is suddenly attacked and bitten in half by an unknown creature. The next day, Sheriff Hank Keough, Fish and Game officer Jack Wells, and American Museum of Natural History paleontologist Kelly Scott go to the lake to investigate the incident with mythology professor and crocodile enthusiast Hector Cyr joining them. After finding Burkes severed head, Jack, Kelly, and Hank witness Delores Bickerman, an elderly hermit living near the lake, feeding a blindfolded dairy cow to the giant crocodile. Hector decides to take Deputy Sharon Gare on a trip in his helicopter and unexpectedly lands it in the crocodiles territory. Later, Jack and Hank plan to allow Florida Fish and Game to kill the crocodile when they arrive, but Hector suggests instead that he should lure it out of the water and tranquilize it into unconsciousness. Hector pulls up and loses the animal, but crashes the helicopter into the lake. The crocodile comes on land and begins to pursue Jack, Kelly, and the group. Kelly is knocked into the lake by the crocodiles tail, but she makes it into the helicopter in time. The crocodile catches up to Kelly and prepares to make its move, but is itself trapped in the helicopter. As Hector comes out of the water, another crocodile attacks and bites him, but Hank blows it up with his grenade launcher.

Name: october sky

Homer and Quentin calculate the precise distance of the missing rocket and find it in a stream. John, with Homer and Jim in tow, exits the house to see who fired. Name: office space

Peter decides this is the opportunity hes been waiting for, and meets with the Bobs. Peter spends the next several days hanging with Joanna and fishing with Lawrence. He meets with his friends that night and asks Michael Bolton if the virus hes always talking about will really work. Peter assures Samir and Michael that Lawrence is cool. Name: romance
Summarized_Text: Frustrated by the lack of intimacy in her relationship, a young schoolteacher goes through a series of intimidating and often violent sexual partners. , Although deeply in love with her boyfriend  and indeed sleeping in the same bed with him  a schoolteacher cannot handle the almost complete lack of intimacy he will allow. Increasingly frustrated, she gradually finds her sexual appetites leading her into ever more risky situations, including a developing one with the headmaster.

Name: shes all that
Summarized_Text: A high school jock makes a bet that he can turn an unattractive girl into the schools prom queen. , Shes All That is your typical high school prom king and queen story and the run in defending the star status in the upcoming election. High school hottie, Zack Siler is dumped by his promqueen girlfriend, the equally attractive and extremely popular, Taylor Vaughan who fell for a secondhand world reject TV soap star who she met over the spring break. Having been publicly dumped, Zack defends his discomposure by stating that Taylor is all makeup and wonderbra and he can make any ordinary girl a prom queen with a similar package. His highschool buddy, Dean Sampson, engages him in a bet following this statement and picks the geeky looking Laney Boggs out of the crowd as the girl Zack must transform into the new prom queen. Sofea Shah, In Harrison, the popular high school student Zack Siler is dumped by his girlfriend, the also popular Taylor Vaughan. His best friend Dean Sampson is with their friend Preston and makes a bet with Zack that he is not capable to turn the clumsy and unattractive student of Arts Laney Boggs into the promqueen in a couple of weeks. Problems arise when hot shot Prinze becomes involved and in love with the transformed Cook. On the rebound he takes a bet from his best friend that he can take up with mousey bespectacled Laney Boggs and get her voted prom queen instead.

Name: sleepy hollow
Summarized_Text: Boarding at the home of Baltus Van Tassel and his wife, Lady Van Tassel, he is taken with Baltus spiritual daughter, Katrina. When a fourth victim is killed, Ichabod takes the victims son, Young Masbath, under his wing. He, Young Masbath and Katrina, venture into the Western Woods, where a crone living in a cave reveals the location of the Horsemans grave at the Tree of the Dead. He and Masbath visit Hardenbrook, who reveals that the first victim, Peter Van Garrett, had secretly married the widow, writing a new will that left his estate to her. Ichabod deduces that all the victims except Brom are either beneficiaries or witnesses to this new will, and that the Horsemans master is the person who would have otherwise inherited the estate Baltus, a Van Garrett relative. Hardenbrook commits suicide, and Steenwyck convenes a town meeting to discredit Ichabod, but Baltus bursts into the assembly at the church, announcing that the Horseman has killed his wife. Initially concluding that Katrina controls the Horseman, Ichabod discovers that her diagram, which he believed summoned the Horseman, is really one of protection, and additionally finds a postmortem wound on Lady Van Tassels body. Lady Van Tassel, alive and well, then reveals herself to Katrina, and explains her true heritage from an impoverished family evicted years ago by Van Garrett when he favored Baltus and Katrina instead. Ichabod and Masbath rush to the windmill as the Horseman arrives. His faith restored, Ichabod returns to New York with Katrina and Young Masbath, just in time for the new century.

Name: star wars episode i  the phantom menace
Summarized_Text: Unknown to them, the Trade Federation is in league with the mysterious Sith Lord Darth Sidious, who orders them to invade Naboo with their immense droid army and also to kill the two Jedi. As Jar Jar brings them to an underwater Gungan settlement, the Trade Federation captures Naboos leader, Queen Amidala Natalie Portman. Through a Jedi mind trick, QuiGon secures a submarine, which he, ObiWan, and Jar Jar use to reach the capital of Naboo and rescue Queen Amidala and her escort. As the group prepares to depart, they are attacked by the Sith apprentice Darth Maul Ray Park, who battles QuiGon until the heroes escape. QuiGon informs the Council about Anakin, hoping that he can be trained as a Jedi. To stop the Federation invasion by herself, the Queen decides to return to Naboo with her security team, the two Jedi, R2D2, Anakin, and Jar Jar. On Naboo, Padm reveals herself as Queen Amidala and forms an alliance with the Gungans for the battle against the Trade Federation. Meanwhile, Queen Amidala and her forces fight their way into the palace and capture Nute Gunray, Viceroy of the Trade Federation. With his final breath, QuiGon instructs ObiWan to train Anakin to become a Jedi. Meanwhile, the Jedi Council promotes ObiWan to the level of Jedi Knight, and Yoda reluctantly accepts ObiWans request to train Anakin as his padawan.

Name: tarzan

Name: the blair witch project

Name: the boondock saints
Summarized_Text: They decide to fuck with him and pull him into the hotel room, concealing their identity with masks, and threaten to execute him. The fact that all the killings involved the Russian Mob leads Smecker to the theory that the executions were the result of the feud between the Russian and Italian mobs. Papa Joe, believing that the mob killings are an act of revenge from Rocco for setting him up to be killed, contracts the infamous contract killer Il Duce Billy Connolly, to deal with the vengeful package boy. His sympathy for the brothers conflicting with his professional desire to bring them to justice, Smecker a flamboyant homosexual goes on a drinking binge at a gay bar before seeking advice from a nearby Catholic church. Inspired by the advice, Smecker decides to help the brothers. The McManus brothers and Rocco infiltrate the Yakavetta headquarters to finish off the family, but are captured by Papa Joe and his henchmen who recently arrived to protect Papa Joe from such an attack. The brothers manage to free themselves and tend to Rocco while Smecker, disguised as a female prostitute, distracts the other mobsters. Smecker kills the remaining mobsters only to be knocked unconscious by Il Duce who mistakes Smecker for a woman. As he hears them recite the family prayer, and upon seeing that the man he was hired to kill Rocco is dead, he lowers his weapons and joins them. Three months later Papa Joe is sent to trial, and though there seems to be enough evidence to convict him, the reporters on scene anticipate his acquittal due to his Gottiesque charisma.

Name: the generals daughter

Though cordial and somewhat cooperative, Moore is evasive when questioned, and gives an alibi of being in bed asleep at the time of the murder. Moore is later released by the officer in charge of the jail and restricted to house arrest. nThe Generals adjutant, Colonel George Fowler Clarence Williams III, attempts to close the investigation at the crime scene, stating that Moore killed himself out of guilt because he killed Elisabeth. Brenner states he intends to keep the case open and much tension is seen between them. nDuring a large training exercise of around 1000 personnel, she had found herself separated from her group and was jumped by six male cadets, beaten and raped all night, almost to the point of death and left to die in an isolated area staked down in exactly the same manner she was murdered in. Realizing that Kent is the only suspect left, Brenner decides to question him. with Kent, who also wants to see Brenner. As Campbell prepares to get on the plane to accompany Elizabeths body to the funeral, he is confronted by Brenner, who lays the burden of his daughters death on the general disgusted, he tells Campbell that his betrayal of Elisabeth was what really killed her and that Kent had just put her out of her misery.

Name: the green mile
