Summarized_Text: The couple knows they cut the wires and they make a run for it. He grabs Evas throat and licks her face, when another banging is heard. On their trek to Tanyas home, Shane gets his foot caught in a trap. The five run again while the Purgers kill other bystanders that were hiding. The five run out again and try to escape. They fire at the other Purgers, and then offer to help out the group. Since it did not happen during the Purge, Warren was arrested and charged with drunk driving and manslaughter of a child, but he was let go on a legal technicality despite his bloodalcohol level being very high. Leo walks out of the home, and is then shot twice. The shooter is Big Daddy, who looms over Leo, stating that he shouldnt have saved Eva and Cali, as they were his to kill. Before he kills Leo, Big Daddy is shot in the head by Warren, whom Leo chose not to kill after all.

Name: the theory of everything
Summarized_Text: The movie starts as the Cambridge student Stephen Hawking meets Jane, and although shy at first, eventually they both get close. But Jane insists they stay together, knowing the illness will progress and slowly take Stephen away from her. Jonathan gets close to Jane and her family, even with Stephen. He goes as far as being a helping hand for Stephen when the family goes on an outdoors trip. Jane ultimately starts to feel attracted to Jonathan. But Jonathan backs away when friends and families start to whisper. As Jane goes with Jonathan, Stephen goes to watch an opera. Jane insists on a tracheotomy, but the family then struggle communicating with Stephen. Jane hires a help, Elaine, who quickly suits Stephens needs while Jane slowly slips away from him. Jane goes on to marry Jonathan.

Name: the voices
Summarized_Text: Fiona, terrified, runs off into the woods. The sheriff asks him about his car crash. At his appointment with his shrink, Jerry confesses that he doesnt take his meds at all. He didnt want to be a slave to drugs but hes still between Rosco and Whiskers.  She finds out Jerrys address through Miltons files and brings some cakes to his house. Other coworkers from Milton begin to wonder about Fiona and Lisa. He falls apart in front of his counsellor Dr.  Warren and confesses his killings but she tries to make a call. Down in the bowling alley, Jerry collapses and dies from smoke inhalation.

Name: this is where i leave you
Summarized_Text: Judd reunites with his older brother Paul Corey Stoll and Pauls wife Annie Kathryn Hahn, who had once been Judds girlfriend. During a family gathering, Wendy drunkenly badgers Judd to tell the truth about Quinn. Quinn shows up the next day and reveals shes pregnant with Judds child. A few days later, after Barry leaves for a conference, Wendy sleeps with Horry, with whom she is still in love. Quinn calls Judd out of fear that she is having a miscarriage, and he admits to Penny that Quinn is pregnant. Judd gets to the hospital to be with Quinn where Wade also shows up. As he leaves, Wade tells Judd hes not ready to be a stepdad and leaves Quinn. The next day, Tracy talks with Judd and decides to break up with Phillip. Paul sees Judd hugging her and assumes Judd is hitting on her. Paul attacks Judd as Tracy leaves Phillip, resulting in the three brothers fighting.

Name: transcendence
Summarized_Text: Following one of Wills presentations, an antitechnology terrorist group called Revolutionary Independence From Technology R. I. F. T.  shoots Will with a poloniumlaced bullet and carries out a series of synchronized attacks on A. I.  laboratories across the country. Evelyn demands that Max leave and connects the computer intelligence to the Internet via satellite. Evelyn, however, grows fearful of Wills motives when he displays the ability to remotely connect to and control peoples minds after they have been subjected to his nanoparticles. A side effect of the virus would be the destruction of technological civilization. The FBI and the members of R. I. F. T.  attack the base with artillery, destroying much of its power supply and fatally wounding Evelyn. Evelyn tells Will that Max should not die because of what theyve done, so Will uploads the virus to save Max. As Will dies, he explains to Evelyn that he did what he did for her, as she had pursued science to repair the damage humans had done to the ecosystems.

Name: transformers age of extinction
Summarized_Text: Things heat up when someone reports Cades purchase of the semi truck, and soon, the Cemetary Wind are dispatched to Cades property, where Savoy threatens to kill Tessa unless Cade gives them Optimus. Of the two, it is Galvatron who is sent after Optimus Prime, who attempts to stab Galvatron in his spark chamber, but finds none. It happens that Tessa had sought refuge in the vehicle, and Cade attempts to get her out, but fails. As it flies low over a bridge, Cade, Shane, and the other Transformers clamber aboard. To cause a distraction, Crosshairs has the ships docking cables deploy, causing them to attach to The Willis Tower, and stop the ship from warping into space. Joyce is also upset that control of Galvatron in the fight was lost at several points. This causes the humans, Bumblebee, and Hound to spill out of the open gantry, as the ship spirals off into a mountainous area nearby, with Prime, Crosshairs, and Drift along with the captured Legendary Knights aboard. Optimus then takes one of the swords from the ship, and frees the other Legendary Knights who were captured aboard the ship aka, the Dinobots! With that, the 4 released beings transform, and head towards the fight!With their help, the Autobots manage to destroy the drones, but Galvatron escapes in the fight while Stinger is killed by Bumblebee. However, in the fight nearby, Optimus notices Cade in danger, and fires on Attinger, killing him instantly!

Name: tusk
Summarized_Text: The next morning, Wallace wakes up to find himself strapped into a wheelchair and his left leg amputated. Wallace finds the story incredulous and finally realizes Howes insanity when he makes a joke about the spider over dinner, where Howe not only reveals his ability to walk, but his plans for Wallace having a frightening obsession with the walrus, he plans to fit Wallace into a perfectly constructed walrus costume. His attempts to contact Ally and Teddy  having an affair behind Wallaces back  fail when neither answer their phone before Howe beats him in the back of the head with an oosik telling him his human life is over. Now fully aware of the danger Wallace is in, Ally and Teddy fly to Canada to look for him, turning up numerous failed leads. Howe revels at the return of his beloved Mr.  Tusk in his monstrous aberration of man and walrus. Ally and Teddy find the enclave and are horrified by Wallaces altered appearance. Ally and Teddy, still broken up over the situation, come visit him and feed him a mackerel. Ally, remembering a discussion she had with Wallace the day before he left for Canada about how crying separates humans from animals, tells Wallace she still loves him before walking off crying.

Name: unbroken
Summarized_Text: At one point, Louie finally stabs a shark from the boat and they begin to feast on its meat. Louie dives back into the water but Mac and Phil huddle back on the boat. The good news is a boat has discovered them the bad news is it is the Japanese and they are now being held prisoner. Louie and Phil are taken to a P. O. W.  camp and told they are the enemy and will be treated accordingly by a man who speaks English. He is then taken to a restaurant where he is asked to make another announcement where he applauds Japan as a culture and to live the rest of his life in the country, as a traitor. He prompts Louie to congratulate him on the promotion but Louie stays silent. He tells the guards, who are surrounding Louie, to shoot him if he should drop the beam. Louie holds the beam over his head for hours, much to the admiration of his other prisoners. The men are told that they have to bathe in the ocean. Louie is flown home to his family and embraced by them.

Name: unfriended
Summarized_Text: She continues talking, but he disappears from the conversation. She goes on the Facebook profile but both Unfriend and ReportBlock are unclickable. When they go back in the chat, Billie calls Val a floozy, infuriating Val who demands to know who Billie227 is. Ken says that Laura was a slut and she deserved what happened to her. She adds, But theyre good people. Jess notes its the drinking game but Blaire has never even heard of the game, so they explain that she holds up five fingers and if she has done something, she puts one down. Finally, Adam admits it was him apparently as an exchange between him and BillieLaura Barns. but they say they cant tell him. Mitch says If you dont tell me, Ill hang up. He is just about to hang up when Blaire finally shows him the piece of paper.

Name: vhs viral
Summarized_Text: After watching on the news that an outofcontrol ice cream truck is being chased by the police around the upper LA area, killing people and wrecking havoc among the way, a group of teens hellbent on capturing the next viral video set out to chase the van. Things go from bad to worse when the content inside the van is revealed to be several tapes with bizarre stories, including that of a deranged illusionist who, after obtaining a demonpowered cloak, sets out on a killing spree a garage scientist that manages to build a machine and open the door to a parallel world, where he and his double find out that their worlds are dangerously different and the story of teenage skaters who unleash hordes of demonic foes after desecrating a ritual site in Tijuana.

Name: whiplash
Summarized_Text: Andrew abruptly stops playing drums when the band conductor, Terence Fletcher J. K.  Simmons appears at the door in front of him and asking Andrew some personal information of him. While Andrew plays drums, Fletcher slams the door but he comes back to retrieve his forgotten jacket. Suddenly, Fletcher breaks inside and Andrew becomes horrified of him. Fletcher conducts every saxophonist and bassist one by one and finally the drums. Fletcher slaps Andrew every four in 12 counts he makes and he will not stop questioning until Andrew answers whether he is dragging or rushing. Once again, Fletcher tells Andrew that he is upset, louder. At his home, Andrew keeps practicing drums, making his hand bleed in the process. As he fails to reach the required tempo, Andrew punches the drum in frustration and his hand is bleeding, dripping it in the pitcher of ice. On the way to a jazz competition, the bus that Andrew rode breaks down. Fletcher is at first angry, but gives a nod of approval to Andrew as he finishes.

Name: wild
Summarized_Text: Cheryl explains that shes hiking the Pacific Crest Trail PCT and doesnt have an address, so the clerk tells her to put her parents address down. Paul tells her that he will pass along a message to her brother and asks how shes feeling about the hike. Cheryl seems to be uncomfortable with this information but Paul tells her that shes the one who felt she had to hike 1,000 miles. As Cheryl goes through her prep, we see flashes of memories, Cheryl having sex with someone, her mother dancing, Cheryl using heroin, Cheryl fighting with a man in a car. Realizing that she wont be put off, the man agrees to take her when hes done and tells her to wait in his truck. Cheryl tells him that he doesnt have to do that, he can just take her into town, but he insists. The man and his wife welcome Cheryl into their home, serving her a hot homecooked meal, though the wife puts down newspapers on Cheryls chair as shes been hiking for many days. In the morning, the man drives Cheryl into town so she can buy the right kind of gas for her stove and takes her back to the trail. Cheryl is annoyed by this and tells Bobbi and Leif is old enough to get himself something to eat and that Bobbi should be focused on her schoolwork, but Bobbi tells her that being a mother is the most important thing in her life. Greg tells her that hes been averaging over 20 miles a day, and Cheryl is embarrassed to admit how slowly shes been going.

Name: wild tales
Summarized_Text: The loan sharks teenage son arrives and begins to share his fathers meal. The cook is arrested and driven away in a police car. When Mario is about to leave, Diego pushes him and his car into the river, and drives off. Mario enters Diegos car and the men start to fight. As the car explodes, the tow truck driver called by Diego arrives. Hasta que la muerte nos separenAt a Jewish wedding8 reception, the bride Romina rica Rivas discovers her groom Ariel Diego Gentile has had sex with one of the guests. Romina confronts Ariel as they dance in front of everyone, and in distress, Romina runs to the roof, where a kitchen worker comforts her. Ariel discovers Romina having sex with the worker she tells Ariel she will sleep with every man who shows her interest and will take everything Ariel owns if he tries to divorce her, or when he dies. Romina pulls the woman with whom Ariel had sex onto the dance floor, spins her around, and slams her into a mirror. Ariels mother attacks Romina but Ariel and Rominas father pull her off, and Romina collapses with emotion.

Name: xmen days of future past
Summarized_Text: Patrick Stewarts Charles Xavier recounts how humans created sentinels to hunt and kill mutants. Each time the sentinels attack, Warpath spots them, the mutants make a line of defense to buy some time, Kitty sends Bishop back through time with the warning of the attack, and the mutants of the past flee before the attack can ever take place. Professor Xavier plans to go back in time to stop the assassination of Bolivar Trask and in turn, prevent the antimutant tide that leads to the creation of the sentinels. Logan asks to see Charles but is rebuffed by Hank. Logan asks Charles to read his mind, but Charles cant. The guards open fire and Erik gets ready to kill them, ignoring Charles pleas not to. Things get heated between Charles and Erik as Charles accuses Erik of taking the things that were most precious away from him. Charles tries to explain everything to Mystique and persuade her to drop the gun. They proceed to use cerebro to try and locate Raven, but Charles is overwhelmed by all the noise he has been keeping out for the past 10 years. Nixon addresses the nation and drops the curtains, unveiling the sentinels to the public to much applause.

Name: alvin and the chipmunks the road chip
Summarized_Text: The Chipmunks believe that Dave plans to propose to his new girlfriend in Miami. , Alvin, Simon, Theodore have been living with, and annoying, Dave Seville for about 8 years now. Now they discover that Dave has a girlfriend and worry that hell dump them for her. To save their relationship with Dave, the Chipmunks must find a way to stop him from proposing. Dave has a new girlfriend, Samantha, whose son Miles treats them badly. Dave must go to Florida to help one of his artists, and he leaves the Chipmunks behind and takes Samantha. They think Dave plans to propose to her, and fear hell ditch them. But theyre far from Florida so they must go on foot. The next day he takes them to minigolf to meet his new girlfriend Samantha. Later, the Chipmunks find an engagement ring in a bag Dave brought home and believe hell propose to Samantha, so they try to steal the ring.

Name: avengers age of ultron
Summarized_Text: Their research leads to the discovery of a net of neurons that Tony realizes could be reconfigured into an artificial intelligence stored inside the scepters gem. Onboard the train, Ultron gains the upper hand on Steve, and begins beating him up. Undeterred, Ultron fires a unibeam blast in Pietros direction, killing the trains driver, then takes off in pursuit of the flying trailer. Natasha plants explosives in the trailer to destroy it and transfers the cradle to the quinjet, but is snatched by Ultron. The heroes get a brief reprieve as Vision confronts Ultron in the church. Ultron doesnt take his loss lying down, and out of spite, he activates the drill, causing the city to ascend into the sky, with no way to evacuate those still in it. After a short battle, the Avengers decimate the majority of the drone army. With assistance from Tonys unibeams and Thors lightning, they inflict severe damage to the primary body, melting the right side of his face, and the Hulk then tosses him away as he tries to monologue.

Name: beasts of no nation
Summarized_Text: The leader is a man called Commandant Idris Elba who lets Agu join their battalion. A survivor is brought to the Commandant, who then gives Agu a machete and orders him to kill the man. At night they relax and the Commandant calls in Agu to his office. Agu has found a tinfoil pack of drugs on a dead body and offers it to the Commandant. Going into the bedroom the Commandant snorts the drugs, lays back on his cot and summons Agu to pleasure him. After, Agu starts using drugs like the older boys in the battalion. The Commandant is summoned to see the Supreme Commandant, he brings Agu, Strika and a few others. For his last night with his boys the Commandant takes them to a brothel. The Commandant refuses his promotion and takes his battalion back into the bush. In a skirmish Strika is shot, Agu tries to carry him piggyback but the boys dies.

Name: bite
Summarized_Text: For her bachelorette party, Casey Morgan goes to Costa Rica with her friends Kirsten and Jill. Casey and Jared live in separate apartments in the same building to appease Jareds disapproving mother Mrs.  Kennedy, who is also their landlord. Kirsten implores Casey to leave with her, but Casey insists that she cannot abandon her eggs.  Casey captures Jill using her newlydeveloped poison stinger tail. Jill pleads for mercy before Casey shows her video footage proving that Jill purposefully allowed the man in Costa Rica to take advantage of Casey while she was drunk. Casey kisses Jill to put pus in her mouth and forces her former friend to scream for Jared. Jared wrestles Casey to the ground, but she stings him with her tail. He then repeatedly stomps Caseys head with his foot and kills her. He collapses before he can dial 911.

Name: black mass
Summarized_Text: Olsen asks Kevin to tell him everything he knows about his involvement with the Winter Hill Gang of South Boston, the business dealings of former FBI Agent John Connolly Joel Edgerton, and anything Kevin can say about his former bossfugitive James Whitey Bulger Johnny Depp. John later meets with Whitey at night. He proposes an idea for Whitey to be his informant to take down other mobs, specifically the Angiulos. The Angiulos murder a Winter Hill Gang member, leading Whitey to go ahead and agree to be an informant. He confides in Steve over his actions, which surprises Steve. He has also separated from Lindsey after Douglas passes away. They dismiss his confession as a bad coke episode. Whitey doesnt say a word, yet he knows what led to this question. Morris says its a family secret, but Whitey playfully presses him to tell. Billy sits in his living room looking somber, most likely already hearing about his brother.

Name: blackhat
Summarized_Text: A furloughed convict and his American and Chinese partners hunt a highlevel cybercrime network from Chicago to Los Angeles to Hong Kong to Jakarta. , Nick Hathaway, an extremely talented hacker who has gone astray, finds his way out of a 15 year prison sentence when parts of a computer code he once wrote during his youth appears in a malware that triggered a terrorist attack in a nuclear power plant in China. This opportunity will reunite him with an old friend but will also put him in the middle of a power game between the American and Chinese government as well as an arch villain hacker whose identity he has to find if he wants to keep his freedom and his life. Colonel Chen Dawai is assigned by the Chinese government and he meets the American Carol Barrett and Mark Jessup in Los Angeles. He invites his sister Chen Lien and he discovers that the hacker used a computer code developed by his old MIT friend Nick Hathaway, who is in prison for stealing money from banks. He requests that Nick joins the team and they have to travel to China following the lead. Will he succeed in finding who is the responsible for the attacks?Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, The FBI exceptionally agrees to collaborate with its Chinese counterpart when a brilliant hacker sabotages a nuclear plant in Chai Wan, Hong Kong, to explode from overheating. Chinas Peoples Liberation Army PLA cyber warfare unit ace, captain Chen Dawai, is tasked to find the culprits, enlists his sister, hacking engineer Chen Lien, and convinces unenthusiastic, intellectually inferior FBI counterpart Carol Barrett to appeal to his former MIT roommate, Nicholas Hathaway, who knows his value and obtains a deal to end his hacking conviction to jail time if they succeed while his electronically monitored and by deputy U. S.  marshal Mark Jessup. Analyzing the hackers code yields clues trailing to Tokyo and Jakarta as well as the realization the power plant was just a test, the real target is a disruption of the stock exchange and world economy to make a speculative fortune, but the ruthless gang is soon on their tail and stops at nothing to avoid exposure, while Nick and Lien have an affair.

Name: bone tomahawk
Summarized_Text: At the towns saloon, Hunt confronts Purvis. Sheriff Hunt shoots Purvis in the leg when he tries to escape. Leaving Samantha with Purvis and his deputy Nick, Hunt and the others return home. Hunt calls a local Native American man to examine the arrow, and informs Arthur of the news. Certain that Samantha, Nick and Purvis had been captured by them, Hunt prepares to go after them with Arthur. Chicory sets his leg and leaves him behind to recover, while he, Hunt, and Brooder move on. After killing two attackers, Hunt and Chicory retreat, leaving Brooder, who is seriously injured. Brooder kills one attacker before being killed himself. Arthur arrives and kills one of the tribesmen, while Hunt kills the leader with one the tribes bone tomahawks. Arthur frees Samantha and Chicory, while a mortally wounded Hunt stays behind with his rifle.

Name: bridge of spies
Summarized_Text: Donovan has dinner with his wife Mary Amy Ryan and kids Carol Eve Hewson, Roger Noah Schnapp and Peggy Jillian Lebling. Abel never admits to any wrongdoing and doesnt want to fully cooperate with the United States government. The pilots are brought into the Peshawar Air Station to see the U2 planes that they will use in their mission, complete with cameras and the like. On the train, everyone that Donovan sees is reading unkind headlines for his case, and one woman on the train looks at him scornfully. The CIA only wants Powers back, but Donovan plans to make a negotiation regardless. He travels to East Germany to meet with Wolfgang Vogel Sebastian Koch, a German lawyer who can broker a deal. During his time in East Germany, Donovan is forced to stay in a cold and crummy hotel room. The men on both sides meet on the Glienicke Bridge. Donovan returns home to his family. The kids see the news story on the exchange and are shocked to hear their dads name mentioned, thinking he was away on a fishing trip.

Name: burnt
Summarized_Text: Adam wants to take over the hotels restaurant, but Tony doesnt trust him after his behavior in Paris. David agrees to work at Adams restaurant and let Adam stay in his apartment. Simones review of Adams food is favorable enough that Tony and his father agree to renovate their hotels kitchen and hire Adam as the head chef. The opening night turns into such a disaster that Adam closes the restaurant early. He offers her more money and some insight on Adams behavior he grew up in an unhappy home and has always been volatile but brilliant. Their relationship continues to improve when Adam bakes a cake for Helenes daughter Lily Lexie BenbowHart on her birthday. Once Langhams has established itself, Tony and Adam prepare to earn a Michelin star. The drug dealers henchmen have returned, and they want Adam to go with them. Tony and Helene want to take Adam to the hospital, but before they can do much more than clean him up, they learn that two Michelin judges have come to Langhams. They finish the judges meals and minutes later, the waiter returns with two uneaten meals.

Name: carol
Summarized_Text: Therese and Carol meet at the restaurant. Carol tells Therese that she and her husband are divorcing. At her home, Carol and her daughter decorate the tree. Therese isolates herself at the piano and plays a tune. Carol tells her its something she would have been told by others. Inside, Therese can hear them yelling, with Harge accusing Carol of being in love with the shop girl in their home, lamenting that he thought she had recovered from her period of immorality. Back in New Jersey, Harge arrives at Abbys door, asking for Carol and saying he will drop the charges if she stays with him. A little later, they arrive in Waterloo, Iowa, a quaint little town. Carol is dismissive towards this. The two have a conversation where Carol dotes on Therese, telling her she looks divine.

Name: chappie
Summarized_Text: Moore leaves without interacting with any of these tough characters. Yolandi tells him that he should leave because Ninja will kill him if he finds him there. While the two are alone, Deon tries to reason with Chappie, but Chappie tells him that hes angry that Deon didnt tell him that he was going to die in a few days. However Chappie knows he is still going to die in a few days and says he wants to be transferred into a new robot body that is hanging there. Deon explains that The Moose is controlled by transferring a human operators consciousness into The Moose via a control helmet. The gang has Chappie help them rob an armored car, and it is covered live on the news. The rocket is ineffective and Moose turns and shoots Yolandi dead.  Chappie hacks into the Tetravaal robot factory and has it create a new schematic, for a female scout.

Name: child 44
Summarized_Text: Angry, Leo strikes Vasili, who harbors growing resentment against Leo and the other officer in the unit, Alexei Andreyev all three were in Berlin together in 1945. When the body of another child is found near the railway line in Volsk, with similar injuries to Jora, Leo begins to realize that a serial killer is on the loose. However, Leo persuades Nesterov, who has young sons himself, to investigate further, and the two discover that the bodies of at least 43 more children have been found along the railway line from RostovonDon to Moscow. Meanwhile, Vasili, who now has Leos old job, calls Raisa and attempts to persuade her to leave Leo and join him in Moscow. When she refuses, Vasili orders an MGB agent to abuse her. Leo and Raisa travel in secret to Moscow to interview a woman who reported seeing Jora with a stranger in the railway yards. Leo kills him and they escape just before Vasili arrives. Leo and Raisa manage to return to Volsk, but there they are arrested by Vasili and his men for Sukovs murder. During the train ride, they are attacked by killers on Vasilis orders after killing their assailants, Leo and Raisa jump off the train. He surrenders to them and says he cannot control his urges to kill children, but is suddenly shot in the head by Vasili, who has followed Leo and Raisa.

Name: circle
Summarized_Text: He is killed by the group.  A man comments that he voted for the man who was killed because he saw him vote for the pregnant lady and that was the only way to stop him. He is killed by the group. The man gets killed by the group. She is killed by the group. A man says that everyone should vote for the guy with one arm who was in favour of saving the child and pregnant lady because it will even things out. 6 people are left after a man says that he is sorry to the pregnant lady and sacrifices himself. The good guy, the pregnant lady and the child realise they have to vote for the old man.

Name: colonia
Summarized_Text: Lena then recognizes her boyfriend Daniel Daniel Brhl as a lead speaker of the event. After this Lena goes to meet the other people who were present at Daniels rally. Meanwhile, we see that Daniel has been tortured by the army until Pious turns up pretending to be a caring savior of those being tortured by the army. In a hope to meet Daniel, Lena swims naked in a river in order to be taken to the mens gathering, to cleanse her of her indecency. However she didnt see Daniel there as he was trying to escape that night. Next time they meet Daniel gives the photos to Lena who is not pleased with the danger that the photos put them in. The two are then dismissed, and Lena knocks out Gisela who was escorting her back to her quarters, and she returns to the barn to meet Daniel who found that the next day the Sarin experiment would be performed on him and this is his last chance to escape through tunnels that he believes lead to outside world. Lena and Daniel escape while Ursel is killed by a tripwireoperated gun. Locked in a side room she sees that the embassy have brought Pious and the army after them, so she smashes a window and they escape the room just in time. Sensing the danger they are in, and fueled by his loyalty to his good friend Lena, Captain Roman ignores this order and takes off anyway, saving Lena and Daniel.

Name: creed
Summarized_Text: Undaunted, Donnie travels to Philadelphia in hopes of getting in touch with his fathers old friend and rival, Rocky Balboa. Pete has been begging Rocky for years to train Leo,  is angry that Rocky is now training this nobody from LA. Word gets out that he is Creeds illegitimate son. Conlan was supposed to fight Wheeler for his last fight, but he broke Wheelers jaw during a Pre matchup  now needs a new opponent. Donnie balks at first, wanting to forge his own legacy. He is unwilling to undergo chemotherapy, remembering that it was not enough to save Adrian when she had ovarian cancer. First, before going into the ring, Donnie receives a present from Mary Anne  new American flag trunks similar to the ones Apollo and later Rocky wore. Additionally, to the surprise of nearly everyone, Donnie goes the distance after giving Conlan all he can handle. As Jim Lampley puts it while calling the fight for HBO, Conlan won the fight, but Creed won the night. The film ends with Donnie and a frail but improving Rocky climbing the Rocky Steps at the entrance of the Philadelphia Museum of Art.

Name: crimson peak
Summarized_Text: Set in Cumbria, England, in a crumbling mansion in a largely rural and mountainous region of northern England in the early 20th century, young author Edith Cushing Mia Wasikowska falls in love and marries Sir Thomas Sharpe Tom Hiddleston but then discovers that her charming new husband is not who he appears to be. Wrapping her dark, decaying fingers around young Ediths shoulder as the girl shudders in her bed trying to will away her terror, the ghost whispers a warning Beware of Crimson Peak. 14 years later in 1901, when Edith is a young woman living in Buffalo, New York she aspires to write about the ghosts she sees and encounters, though it is implied that her mothers is the clearest and most intimate encounter she has ever had. Remembering the horror of being visited by her mother, Edith immediately agrees and sets sail for England. Edith is once again visited by the spirit of her mother who again wraps her fingers around Ediths shoulder and offers the same warning Beware of Crimson Peak. Edith becomes inconsolable after visits by other ghosts begin to terrify her, but Lucille firmly insists that she stays. As Ediths inquiries about the houses and the familys histories begin to become more vocal, ghosts begin to appear all the more, beckoning her to the mines below. One of the ghosts lures Edith to a linen closet where she discovers wax cylinders on which one of Thomas previous wives recorded a message telling that the Sharpes are poisoning her for her inheritance. Realizing that his wife is in mortal danger, Thomas helps Edith escape the house and is killed by Lucille in the process, dying the better man he had always wished to be. The two escape to a nearby city while the film reveals the images of the Sharpe siblings ghosts now residing in the home.

Name: demolition
Summarized_Text: A successful investment banker struggles after losing his wife in a tragic car crash. With the help of a customer service rep and her young son, he starts to rebuild, beginning with the demolition of the life he once knew. , Davis Jake Gyllenhaal, a successful private equity fund partner, struggles after losing his wife in a tragic car crash. Despite pressure from his fatherinlaw, Phil Chris Cooper, to pull it together, Davis continues to unravel. What starts as a complaint letter to a vending machine company turns into a series of letters revealing startling personal admissions. Davis letters catch the attention of customer service rep, Karen Naomi Watts, and, amidst emotional and financial burdens of her own, the two form an unlikely connection. With the help of Karen and her son Chris Judah Lewis, Davis starts to rebuild, beginning with the demolition of the life he once knew. Fox Searchlight, Davis Mitchell Jake Gyllenhaal has a comfortable life as a Wall Street investment banker, but its brought to an abrupt halt when his wife is killed in a car accident. As he struggles to move on from this tragedy, he reflects on the stagnant marriage he had with his late spouse. He also becomes obsessed with dismantling the machines surrounding him as a coping mechanism, and begins a relationship with a customerservice representative for a vendingmachine company Naomi Watts after sending them multiple complaint letters.

Name: everest
Summarized_Text: She and Rob remind the climbers of the lack of oxygen at the top of Everest, as well as the dangers of hypothermia and hypoxia. Rob urges the rest of his team to use oxygen. Rob contacts Helen back at base camp to inform her and the team that they made it to the top. The other climbers go get help, leaving Beck behind with Yasuko. Andy goes up to Rob, wherein Rob tells Andy that Doug is gone. Helen, sitting in the tent with Caroline and Guy who has come to join the camp, radios Rob and urges him to keep moving downward. Helen calls Jan and gets her to talk to Rob by putting the phone next to the walkietalkie. Helen calls Peach to tell her that Beck never returned to camp, which she must in turn tell her kids. Helen and the other climbers return home. We see photos of the real Rob Hall, Doug Hansen, Andy Harris, Yasuko Namba, and Scott Fischer.

Name: fast and furious 7
Summarized_Text: Hobbs asks Dom to promise him he will take Shaw down for good. Roman appears and knocks Shaw off the road. The team goes undercover to a party that the prince is throwing. Dom and Brian drive the car out of there before the gates shut the place down. Dom carries him out, and Jakande gets his hands on Gods Eye. Dom finds Shaw and lures him to a parking lot where they have their final showdown. He encounters Kiet again and kills him when he hooks him up to a weight and pushes him down an elevator shaft. Dom grabs a bag of grenades and drives close enough to stick them onto Jakandes chopper. Letty begs him to stay alive and says she remembers that they got married in the Dominican Republic. The two continue driving until they finally part ways at a fork in the road, with Brian driving into the sunset.

Name: fifty shades of grey
Summarized_Text: Christian gives Ana his business card and tells Ana he is glad Kate wasnt able to make the interview. Christian says its okay for Ana to discuss things with Kate short of the BDSM stuff, but to make sure she doesnt talk to Elliot. Kate and Ana pack up much of their apartment, and Ana thinks about her situation with Christian, and if she wants to pursue a sexual relationship with him. Later that night, Ana and Christian exchange some flirty emails and then Ana begins her internet research on BDSM. She and Christian email back and forth some more, with him confirming their date for 7pm the following day which he will pick her up for. He and Ray have a nice conversation about fishing. In return, she has to accept his graduation present to her a red hatchback, twodoor compact Audi. They exchange emails about Taylor selling her Beetle, and Ana refers to herself as a girl that Christian occasionally fucks. She enjoys the perks of first class despite being annoyed at Christians stalkerish tendencies. She sends him a few flirty emails before takeoff, and one of his responses talks about her being bound and gagged in a crate.

Name: focus
Summarized_Text: Jess figures that Nicky is on to them. Nicky promises as Jess looks on. Nicky and Jess go to the football game. Jess bets 8 while Nicky bets 3. The bets escalate as the two men double the bets, even as Jess tells Nicky they should just leave. Mr.  Liuyan goads him back in, and Nicky bets all the remaining cash 1. Mr.  Liuyan thinks he is crazy and doesnt bet on crazy, so he refuses. On the taxi ride home, Nicky, now with a LOT of money on him, explains to Jess that this was set up from the beginning of the day. She admits to Nicky that Garriga isnt her boyfriend  she just wanted his watch, which is worth two hundred grand.

Name: forsaken
Summarized_Text: In 1872, an embittered gunslinger named John Henry Clayton attempts to make amends with his estranged father Reverend Samuel Clayton while their community is besieged by ruthless landgrabbers. , John Henry returns to his hometown in hopes of repairing his relationship with his estranged father, but a local gang is terrorizing the town. John Henry is the only one who can stop them, however he has abandoned both his gun and reputation as a fearless quickdraw killer.

Name: green room
Summarized_Text: When he enters, he sees two people, Werm Brent Werzner and Amber Imogen Poots, standing over the body of Ambers friend Emily, dead with a knife in her head. This proves to be a lie when Amber sees another pair of feet through the vents. Daniel and Gabe go to the room, where Amber tells Daniel that Werm killed Emily when Werm learned that Emily was going to run away with Daniel, and now Darcy is going to pin her murder on the band. Sam gets shot in the leg and is then mauled by the pit bull. Pat tells an anecdote about a paintball tournament he participated in, which he compares to his current situation as he was outnumbered in both scenarios. They find Pat yelling nonsensically, now with his head shaved and his face with black paint on it. Remorseful for whats happened, he says he wants to go to jail. They leave the club as the morning comes. The two come across Darcy, along with two other skinheads, trying to dispose of Sam, Tiger, and Reeces bodies, trying to come up with another story while also planning to blow up their van by putting a burning rag in the tank. Amber says to tell someone who gives a shit.

Name: hell house llc
Summarized_Text: Five years after an unexplained malfunction causes the death of 15 tourgoers and staff on the opening night of a Halloween haunted house tour, a documentary crew travels back to the scene of the tragedy to find out what really happened. , Five years after an unexplained malfunction causes the death of 15 tourgoers and staff on the opening night of a Halloween haunted house tour Hell House, a documentary film crew visits the scene of the tragedy to investigate what really happened that night. , The tragedy of that horrible October back in 2009 during a Halloween haunted house tour is still surrounded in mystery. Sadly, what led to the death of fifteen people, both crew and customers alike who paid to experience original scares in a controlled environment, remains small town Abaddons greatest secret. However, as both the locals and the authorities claim that the harrowing incident was a result of an unprecedented and unfortunate malfunction, in the meantime, a documentary crew determined to dig for answers in the derelict hotel where it all started, gathers testimonies, photographs and amateur video material all fragments of an intricate, yet gruesome puzzle. Eventually, five years later, that nights sole survivor, Sara, will provide the documentary filmmakers with personal raw footage but is the crew prepared to witness the terror firsthand?Nick Riganas

Name: highrise
Summarized_Text: The unnerving tale of life in a modern tower block running out of control. Within the concealing walls of an elegant fortystorey tower block, the affluent tenants are hellbent on an orgy of destruction. Cocktail parties degenerate into marauding attacks on enemy floors and the onceluxurious amenities become an arena for technological mayhem.

Name: hitman agent 47
Summarized_Text: He fires two shots so that the soldiers in front can apprehend him and Katia. He reveals to Katia that the man shes looking for is Litvenko and he is her father. Smith says that he was last seen years earlier with Stage 3 cancer. 47 informs Katia that her real name means 90, indicating she is a more advanced Agent than 47. Smith orders the other villains to trap them in the city. Le Clerq tells Smith to stop before he kills Litvenko. Le Clerq tries to get answers too, but Litvenko never budges. Smith then realizes that 47 is already in the building. Inside, Litvenko takes out his inhaler, only for Le Clerq to realize too late that its an explosive. They turn back to go into the building, but Katia senses that one more person is there to kill them.

Name: hotel transylvania 2
Summarized_Text: One month later, Johnny tells Dracula that Mavis wants to go flying with him. Months later, Mavis calls for Johnny and Dracula and tells them that Dennis said his first word. Dracula tells Dennis that hell dance for him if Dennis will try to turn into a bat. Dracula mentions that six of Waynes pups are having a birthday party, but Mavis doesnt want Dennis to go, since they play too rough with him. She tells Dracula that she and Johnny have been talking about moving to California, so that Dennis can grow up around other humans she still doesnt think that her son will manifest any vampire powers before his fifth birthday. Dracula tells him to take Mavis to his parents house, while Dracula will watch Dennis. They leave for Johnnys parents house, and Mavis decides to check in on Dennis. Dracula decides that he will have to teach Dennis himself. When he gets close to the ground, Dracula flies down and grabs Dennis. When Vlad meets Dennis, he wants to see his greatvampsons fangs when he has none, he thinks hes a latefanger, just as Dracula was, and tells them that all they have to do is scare Dennis fangs out of him.

Name: in the heart of the sea
Summarized_Text: Herman Melville visits old Thomas Nickerson about the whaling ship Essex. But the executives have him as the first mate instead on his next whaling journey aboard the Essex, accommodating young Captain George Pollard, who is descended from a family of prestigious whalers. One day the captain orders the crew to head into a squall despite Owens warning. Both George and Owen agree to chase the pack, dismissing the demon whale as a myth. The whale oil the crew had gathered earlier catches fire, but the crew are able to save the three harpoon boats and some makeshift sails. After days adrift, Owen spots the demon whale following them. Again Owen spots the demon whale this time, it attacks the boats, killing some men. The crew again they spot the demon. Arriving back in Nantucket, Owen and George are intimidated by the executives, who demand that Owen and George lie to preserve the industrys reputation. The young Nickerson meets Owen before Owen leaves, and Owen gives Nickerson a whale bone pin, a badge of whaling prowess that Nickerson had longingly looked at when he first boarded the Essex.

Name: inside out
Summarized_Text: The emotions live in Headquarters, Rileys conscious mind, where they influence Rileys actions and memories via a control console. The most important or core memories are housed in a hub in Headquarters and power five islands, each of which reflects a different aspect of Rileys personality. Joy acts as the dominant emotion to keep Riley in a happy state, but she and the others do not understand Sadnesss purpose, other than making Riley cry. However, on Rileys first day at her new school, Sadness accidentally causes Riley to cry in front of her class, creating a sad core memory. Joy attempts to dispose of the new core memory before it reaches the central hub, but she accidentally knocks the other core memories loose in her struggle with Sadness, shutting down the personality islands and making them unstable. Before Joy can put them back, she, Sadness, and the core memories are sucked out of Headquarters through the memory tube leading to the rest of Rileys mind. As Riley prepares to board a bus bound for Minnesota, Joy attempts to use a recall tube to return to Headquarters, but the last personality island falls and breaks the tube, sending Joy into the Memory Dump along with Bing Bong. While despairingly looking through old memories, Joy discovers a sad memory in Rileys life that becomes happy when her parents and friends come to comfort her over losing a hockey game, causing her to realize Sadnesss true importance alerting others when Riley needs help or comforting. As her parents comfort and reassure her, Joy and Sadness work together to create a new, amalgamated core memory that creates a new personality island. A year later, Riley has adapted to her new home, and all her emotions now work together to help her lead a content, more emotionally complex life as she ages, with an expanded control console and additional personality islands produced by new core memories comprising multiple emotions.

Name: joy
Summarized_Text: Joys coworkers pull her aside and tell her shes been moved to the night shift which Joy points out she cant do because of her family. When its time to give a toast, Rudy goes into a huge speech about he likes Joy more than Peggy, he acknowledges his new girlfriend the one who kicked him out at the beginning of the film, and tells Joy that her marriage wont last. Her father is ecstatic that he will now have the basement to himself but she tells him to move out, too. After Trudys lawyer does a search, he finds a patent filed in Texas for a similar design by someone in Hong Kong. He tells her he doesnt want to sell a 20 mop that you only have to buy once  he wants to sell a 5 mop that you have to buy hundreds of in your lifetime. The male spokesman is having a meltdown and he calms him down by telling him hes the best seller which upsets a spokeswoman seated nearby.  Joy has been told by their lawyer that when Peggy paid off the overcharges, it validated Joys work relationship with the factory. Joy now begins crying, tells her young daughter never to believe that shes special or that the world owes her anything. Joy says she will have her team make a call to ensure the woman can stay an extra day.

Name: jupiter ascending
Summarized_Text: He orders his people to find Jupiter and kill her. He gets Jupiter out of there. Caine and Jupiter drive away from the city, where Caine continues to explain the history of the Abrasax family. Titus and his people take in Jupiter and apprehend Caine as Stinger hands them over to him in exchange for currency to help his ailing daughter. He plans to kill Jupiter after marrying her so that he can get his claim to Earth. He comes up to the platform where Jupiter and Titus are and informs Jupiter that Titus plans to kill her. They hold Titus at gunpoint, but Jupiter only wants to go home. Caine breaks into Balems facility and kills the lizardrat people to save Jupiters family. Caine fights Sargorn while Balem tries to kill Jupiter himself. Jupiters family is taken to safety while Jupiter fights back against Balem.

Name: jurassic world
Summarized_Text: Prior to its opening, Claire and park owner Simon Masrani Irrfan Khan inspect the parks newest attraction, the Indominus Rex, a transgenic dinosaur created by geneticist Dr.  Henry Wu BD Wong. The Indominus, which can camouflage itself and mask its heat signature, suddenly appears. While exploring the park in a tour vehicle, Zach and Gray enter a restricted area. Masrani and two troopers hunt down the Indominus by helicopter, but it breaks into the parks aviary. The aviarys pterosaurs crash Masranis helicopter, killing its passengers, before converging onto the resort, and attacking everyone, including Zara who is then devoured by a Mosasaurus. Assuming command, Hoskins orders the raptors to be used to track the Indominus, where Owen reluctantly complies and spearheads the assault with the raptors. Upon finding the Indominus, the dinosaurs begin communicating among themselves. Troops fire on the Indominus, but it escapes. Owen reestablishes his bond with the three surviving raptors before the Indominus reappears. The Indominus quickly gains the advantage over the Tyrannosaurus until Blue recovers and joins the battle.

Name: knight of cups
Summarized_Text: Once there was a young prince whose father, the king of the East, sent him down into Egypt to find a pearl. Drinking it, he forgot he was the son of a king, forgot about the pearl and fell into a deep sleep. The King sent many messengers out for his son, in the hopes that one will reach him and guide him home. Ricks father used to read this story to him as a boy. He doesnt know which way to turn. The death of his brother, Billy, hangs over him like a shadow. His father, Joseph Brian Dennehy, bears a sense of guilt for Billys death. Rick seeks distraction in the company of women Della Imogen Poots Nancy Cate Blanchett, a physician he was once married to a model named Helen Freida Pinto Elizabeth Natalie Portman, a married woman he made pregnant a stripper named Karen Teresa Palmer and a young woman who helps him to see his way forward, Isabel Isabel Lucas. Women seem to him to know more than he does. And still each woman, each man hes met through the course of his life has served him in some way as a guide, a messenger.

Name: legend
Summarized_Text: Then Jack tells her that he has a special surprise, taking her to see the last two unicorns  a mare and a stallion. Meanwhile, below the surface of the pond Jack seeks unsuccessfully for Lilys ring. Gump tells Jack that a hero is needed right things. There, Oona reveals to Jack that she is able to assume the form of a beautiful wood fairy and tells him to keep her secret. Blix, trying to avoid Darknesss wrath, drops the horn and it is picked up by Blunder who tell Darkness he will use the horns power to take over Darknesss throne. When Jack, Gump, Screwball and Oona return they revive Tom and he tells them what has happened. She then turns to Jack seductively and even after using her glamour to assume Lilys form, finds that Jack will not sway from his own true love. Outside the room Jack and Gump overhear Darkness tell Lilly his plans to sacrifice the mare at sunset to bring eternal darkness to the world. Gump, convinced she has joined Darkness, tells Jack to shoot her with an arrow. Gump tells Jack that she is under a deep spell.

Name: love
Summarized_Text: Murphy is an American living in Paris who enters a highly sexually and emotionally charged relationship with Electra. Unaware of the effect it will have on their relationship, they invite their pretty neighbor into their bed. , Murphy is an American cinema school student, living in Paris. He had a French girlfriend, called Electra, whom he dated for two years. One day, they met and had a nostringsattached threesome with another woman, a young blonde Danish teenager named Omi, as a way to add some excitement to their love life. But later, he had sex with her behind Electras back, as a result of which Omi became pregnant. This unplanned pregnancy ended the relationship between Murphy and Electra on a horrible note, and it forced Murphy to marry Omi. In one morning, Electras mother, Nora, phones him to ask if hes heard from Electra, because she hasnt heard from her for three months, and given her daughters suicidal tendencies. For the rest of this day, he recalls his past two years with Electra in a series of fragmented, nonlinear flashbacks how they first met in Paris, their quick hookup, and their lives over the next two years which is filled with drug abuse, rough sex and tender moments.

Name: macbeth
Summarized_Text: Three women witches with a girl and infant approach Macbeth and Banquo, hailing Macbeth as Thane of Cawdor and future King, and Banquo as a father of Kings, before disappearing. Macbeth tells his wife of the prophecies. When Macbeth says Duncan will stay overnight, she urges him to kill the King to fulfill the prophecy. Macbeth hesitates but Lady Macbeth persuades him to kill Duncan while she drugs his servants. After the feast, Macbeth sees a boy soldiers ghost, who gives him a dagger and leads him towards Duncans tent whom Macbeth slays. Then, Macbeth sees Banquos ghost. Lady Macbeth says her husband is unwell, but Macbeth continues to rave, prompting Macduff and his wife to leave. Lady Macbeth dismisses the guests and takes Macbeth away. They show him a vision of slain soldiers who tell him to beware Macduff, and that Macbeth shall be King until Great Birnam Wood comes to the royal castle at Dunsinane Hill. The boy soldiers ghost who gave him the dagger tells Macbeth that he will not be slain by man born of a woman.

Name: mad max fury road
Summarized_Text: Furiosa is taking the women away from Joe, prompting him to rally the War Boys and go after her. Nux gets close to the rig as Max attempts to break free. Max and Furiosa fight as he tries to cut the chain that ties him to Nux. Nux wakes up and helps Max fight Furiosa, who is assisted by the other women. Nux cuts the chain and Max tries to take the rig for himself. When Furiosa explains that Joes gratitude toward Max will probably be a slow, painful death, Max gives in and as they ride off in the war rig, Nux sneaks on board. The women tell Max to turn back, but when he tells Furiosa that Splendid went under the wheels, Furiosa says they must keep going. The women continue trying to push the rig out of the mud while Max goes out to face the Bullet Farmer himself. Max, still haunted by the images of his wife and child, decides to help the women go back to the Citadel since Joes greenery and water supply are currently unguarded. Max and Furiosa kill some of the War Boys, while Max gets Joe to kill the People Eater by using him as a human shield.

Name: magic mike xxl
Summarized_Text: After revealing that Dallas has bailed on them to start a new show in Macau, the Kings let Mike in on their plan to end their careers on a high note by traveling to Myrtle Beach for a stripping convention. Later, while trying to work, Mike overhears a song he used to strip to and dances. Reinvigorated, Mike decides to join them on their trip. Mike also meets a photographer named Zoe Amber Heard who tells him that shes headed for New York. They flirt but Mike decides not to pursue her. Back on the road, Mike suggests that they change their routine. In search of a new emcee, Mike brings the group to a strip club owned by Rome Jada Pinkett Smith whom Mike has a history with. During this time, Mike meets Zoe again. After sleeping with Richie, Nancy allows the group to drive her exhusbands car to Myrtle Beach. During Mike and Maliks performance, Mike brings Zoe on stage.

Name: maze runner the scorch trials
Summarized_Text: Thomas encounters them all hung up to a mechanism of sorts, and all of them are unconscious. They come across a merc who aims his stun gun at them, until Minho dropkicks him into a wall. They grab her and head out to the exit. Jorge plays a song that triggers a series of explosives when it finishes. They run outside into a collapsed building. After a few good punches, Marcus tells the gang where they can find The Right Arm. The mercs descend and start attacking people. Ava and Janson step out, confirming that Teresa has been with WCKD from the beginning. Janson shoots and kills Mary, and he nearly kills again until Jorge drives in on a van, leading to a battle between WCKD mercs and The Right Arm. Minho gets shot with a stun gun and is taken by the mercs.

Name: minions
Summarized_Text: A minion Kevin decides to go to the outside world to find a master. He gets Stuart and Bob as his companions. Hitching a ride with the Nelsons, who turn out to be villains also, the minions reach Villain Con. There they see Scarlet Overkill, then the worlds most notorious villain, who turns out to be seeking henchmen. The minions follow Scarlet to her castle and Kevin phones his fellow minions to come. With gadgets from Scarlets husband Herb, the minions succeed in stealing the crown but get caught red handed so they run from capture, until Bob accidentally releases the sword in the stone from the Excalibur legends. Scarlet sends the other villains from Villain Con after the minions. Stuart and Bob get captured. He saves Stuart and Bob while battling Scarlet, while the rest of the minions arrive. Kevin, Stuart and Bob are rewarded by the Queen.

Name: mission impossible  rogue nation
Summarized_Text: Ethan escapes with help from Ilsa, but she refuses to go with him. At his request the IMF is disbanded and absorbed into the CIA, guaranteeing that Ethan  who Hunley thinks has gone rogue  will be captured within the day. Although Ethan and Benji thwart three snipers at the opera one of whom is Ilsa, the Austrian chancellor Rupert Wickham is killed by a car bomb. The three of them execute an elaborate scheme in which Ethan is nearly drowned. During the ensuing chase, Brandt and Luther catch up with Ethan and Benji, while Ilsa joins a team of Syndicate motorcycle goons just long enough to get a bike of her own. She returns to Lane, only to find that Attlee has wiped the drive, which in fact contained an encrypted red box. Brandt contacts Hunley and reveals their location. When the real Attlee arrives, Ethan subdues him and he admits that he had been covering up the existence of the Syndicate since Lane hijacked the project and went rogue. Ethan memorizes the data and destroys the file to force Lane to release Benji and Ilsa in exchange for what he knows. He goads Lane, drawing him into the open and luring him into a bulletproof cell where he is taken into custody.

Name: mr right
Summarized_Text: One by one, Francis picks them all off and kills the agents. Francis is pulled out repeatedly when one hitman is outside demanding that Francis contribute his services to the hitmans employers, but Francis refuses and fights the man before ultimately stabbing him in the neck. Francis demonstrates his skills with knives as he tries to get Martha to catch them. Martha joins Francis one afternoon by a bridge. The man attempts to get Francis to work for him and his employers, but Francis shoots the man in front of Martha. He gets Martha out of there, just as some bad guys, led by another hitman employed by the Cartigans, Shotgun Steve RZA, start attacking. Francis takes most of them out, but Martha ends up getting kidnapped. Meanwhile, Martha is set free and kills one of the Cartigans hitmen before coming across Von. Outside, Hopper confronts Francis, but he gets killed by Steve. In the end, Francis and Martha continue their relationship, but they are still being pursued by bad guys that want Francis dead.

Name: no escape
Summarized_Text: He runs back to his room to get Annie and the girls, but Annie says that Lucy went to the pool by herself because she was acting out. Jack runs to get her while Annie stays in the room with Beeze. Jack runs back toward the room and is almost attacked by a rebel until Hammond comes in at the right moment to kill the rebel. He tells Jack to take his family to the roof. Jack gets Annie and the girls up to the roof where other foreigners are gathered. Jack and Annie grab their girls and run as one rebel opens fire on the foreigners. Jack runs back to his family. The Dwyers get away, but Kenny is killed while Hammond shoots and kills most of the rebels, but he gets wounded. Lucy runs toward him, and the rebel leader grabs her. The family gets on the boat where Jack and Annie paddle toward the Vietnamese border.

Name: pan
Summarized_Text: Peter wakes up in a room in Blackbeards ship. The pirate walks in and tells Peter of a prophet that states that a boy who can fly will fight Blackbeard and kill him. They ride a cart up to the floating boats, only to get pulled back by Blackbeards right hand man Bishop Nonso Anozie. The natives helped bring Mary to the fairy kingdom to protect her, so thats where Peter can find her. Now, they just want to prove that Peter really is her son, so he needs to fly. The three head toward the fairy kingdom on a raft. He sees Mary fighting Blackbeard until the pirate ran her through with his sword, and he screamed in regret and sorrow. He takes the pan necklace from Peter and uses it as the key to enter the fairy kingdom. Smee escapes on a boat. After doing so, the fairies help fight the pirates, sending them off the ships to their doom.

Name: pitch perfect 2
Summarized_Text: The Bellas like her, despite some reservations, and they officially make her a Bella. They are the dominating German team, Das Sound Machine, coled by Kommissar Birgitte Hjort Sorensen and Pieter Flula Borg. The boss is frustrated at not finding anything good to add to this, until Beca steps in and volunteers to tweak with the beat player and then starts singing Here Comes Santa Claus alongside Snoop. Beca goes back to the house to find the ladies pillowfighting. The next one is Country Love, which ruins the Packers since Clay Matthews doesnt know where to start. Sparks go off, and CynthiaRoses hair catches fire, causing another bumbled performance. Aubrey subjects them to several group exercises and activities.   Then Fat Amy starts to say what shell do later on, until she realizes that she is in love with Bumper.

Name: pixels
Summarized_Text: After Brenner gets through every game, he faces hotshot gamer Eddie Plant in Donkey Kong. One soldier Affion Crockett gets taken by the aliens. Cooper brings Brenner into the Oval Office to show him the Galaga aliens attacking. Ludlow brings Brenner back to his home where he says that the aliens are sending creatures with classic video game designs to attack. Violet shows Brenner and Ludlow that the pixels are taken down by strong light beams. Brenner and Ludlow take over with permission from Cooper, and they blast away at the Centipede. He eats a power pellet, giving him ten seconds to be able to eat the ghosts, and he eats Ludlows car as he jumps out. Eddie brings Serena Williams who only showed up because she was promised an island. QBert tells the heroes that the aliens were peaceful until they felt threatened by the time capsule. However, she still fights him until he says he only wants to love her.

Name: room
Summarized_Text: Jack complains that his mom didnt tell Old Nick that it was his birthday and that Nick would have brought a present. Ma sits Jack down and asks if he wants to know where the mouse went after he left the room. Ma tells Jack she has a plan to get him out. Old Nick notes that Jack is burning up and says hell get some antibiotics the next day. She will roll him up in a rug and Old Nick will put Jack in the back of a truck. She asks him where he lives but he tells her a room. She asks if the room has any windows and he says no. The familys lawyer comes and tells them that there is going to be a trial and they will need money and the easiest way to get some is to do a prime time interview. It looks completely different from his new perspective so Jack asks if its been shrunk.

Name: san andreas
Summarized_Text: But Ray is called back to work to rescue disaster victims in Nevada. Emma tells Ray that theyre having an earthquake and he also notices that the freeway is crumbling.  The whole city is now completely devastated. This makes Emma angry and she leaves a nasty message on Daniels voicemail. They drive back to the old couples home. Ray and Emma make it to San Francisco but they cannot land the plane because the airport has a lot of cracks and scattered planes.  The glass shards, coming from the building, cuts Bens leg. He is crushed by a falling shipping container from the overturned cargo ship.

Name: scouts guide to the zombie apocalypse
Summarized_Text: Ben and Carter stop at the liquor store for a moment. A stripper comes out and starts to dance. He chases Ben into the bathroom while Carter hides from the stripper. He sees nobody there other than a weird collection of Dolly Parton items. He chases Augie through the house all the way to the basement where Augie grabs a can of lighter fluid and a gas lighter to set his scout leader on fire.  To make things worse, they hear on the radio that the town is to be bombed in less than two hours. Denise then sees a picture of Kendall and understands why Ben has a crush on her. As the zombies break into the room, Kendalls diary falls out of the underwear drawer. Kendall runs away, only to see that more zombies are coming.

Name: selfless
Summarized_Text: Edward learns that the body he inhabits belonged to another man who sold himself to Albright in order to gain the money he needed to cure their sick daughter. Anton and his henchman overhear the crashing and go to the bathroom. The fire thrower burns the house. Unseen by Anton and his other men, Young Damian shoots the fire thrower, accidentally burns Anton alive but manage to kill the fire by soaking himself into the tub and kills the henchman. nThe two stay at a motel for a while before heading to New Orleans. Young Damian finds Dr.  Jensens wife, Phyllis, in a nursing home suffering from Alzheimers. When Dr.  Phyllis reveals that Albright came every week in her house, to bring butter scotch candy for her, she calls Albright to come in her house.  However, he and Madeline discover Anna playing with Martins young son Tony Dylan Lowe, who died two years ago Martin admits that he used shedding to save his son and that Albrights men are waiting for them. Mark stops taking his medicine in order to experience more memories, hoping they will lead him to Albright.

Name: sicario
Summarized_Text: After a few drinks, Kate goes to her apartment with Ted to have sex. The team succeeds in taking away a substantial amount of money from Diazs account, forcing him to make his return to Mexico. Matt tells Kate to stay out of the way. Kate sees Alejandro apprehend Silvio and hold him at gunpoint. She learns that Alejandro is not a Mexican federal agent, but an assassin originally a member of the Colombian Cartel. He has been hired by the CIA to catch Diazs boss, Fausto Alarcon Julio Cedillo, the local head of the Mexican Sinaloa cartel. The CIA thinks they can control drugs better if the Colombians are in charge. Fausto tells Alejandro that his wife wouldnt like what hes become, a lawyerturnedhitman. Alejandro brings up his daughter. Fausto says it was nothing personal, but Alejandro says it is for him.

Name: sinister 2
Summarized_Text: Deputy So  So from the first Sinister film visits a Catholic confession booth, and it is revealed to the audience that he is no longer a deputy because of his involvement with the Oswalt case. The next day, Dylan texts Deputy with the words Help us! Clint is killed and he twitches violently in the flames, but before Zach can finish off his family, Deputy knocks him down with his car and unties Courtney and Dylan. Zach picks up the camera and a scythe and starts chasing them all through the cornfield, partially cutting off Deputys hand, but they all make it back to the farmhouse. They crush Deputy behind a desk and hit him with golf clubs, but before Zach can finish off Courtney and Dylan, Deputy smashes the camera, exposing the film to the light and destroying it instantly.  The voices of dead kids start drifting from the speakers, chanting Its the kids!

Name: solace
Summarized_Text: Psychic John Clancy Sir Anthony Hopkins works with the F. B. I.  in order to hunt down a serial killer. After having lived in isolation for two years since the death of his daughter, Clancy is asked by his friend Joe, an F. B. I. The problem is that Ambrose is also psychic and far ahead of Clancy. , When F. B. I. The reclusive Clancy, who shuttered his practice and retreated from the world following the death of his daughter and subsequent breakup of his marriage, wants nothing to do with the case. He soon changes his mind after seeing disturbingly violent visions of Joes partner, F. B. I. , In the face of a mysterious spate of unsolvable homicides, the experienced FBI Special Agent Joe Merriwether and his skeptical partner Katherine Cowles decide to enlist the help of Joes psychic old friend, Dr.  John Clancy. Now, two long years after the untimely death of his daughter, the reclusive clairvoyant reluctantly has to put his controversial charisma to good use and attempt to track down the elusive serial killer who terrorizes the city.

Name: southbound
Summarized_Text: Five interlocking tales of terror follow the fates of a group of weary travellers who confront their worst nightmares  and darkest secrets  over one long night on a desolate stretch of desert highway. , On a desolate stretch of desert highway, weary travelers  two men on the run from their past, a band on their way to the next gig, a man struggling to get home, a brother in search of his longlost sister and a family on vacation  are forced to confront their worst fears and darkest secrets in a series of interwoven tales of terror and remorse on the open road.

Name: southpaw
Summarized_Text: Billy Hope Jake Gyllenhaal is an undefeated professional boxer living in New York City with his wife Maureen Rachel McAdams and their daughter Leila Oona Laurence. At a charity event for the orphanage where he and his wife both grew up, Billy is taunted by an upandcoming boxer, Miguel Magic Escobar, leading to a brawl in which Maureen is accidentally shot and killed by Miguels brother Hector, who flees. He eventually gets a tip of his whereabouts, but finds only his drugaddict wife Maria Rita Ora, and leaves after learning Hector is a father. The incident drives Billy to become sober, but Leila cuts ties with him, blaming him for their predicament. At the behest of friends, Billy gets a job at a gym owned by seasoned boxer, Titus Tick Wills Forest Whitaker, and eventually convinces Tick to become his trainer. Billys former manager Jordan Mains 50 Cent, who is currently managing Miguel, arranges a fight between the two that could put Billy back in the spotlight. Tick is reluctant to train Billy, fearful he might be blinded by his vendetta against Miguel, but is motivated to do so when another of his students is killed by his abusive father while attempting to defend his mother. Leila is reluctant to forgive her father, but she is allowed to watch the fight by closed circuit in the locker room with Angela. As the match begins, Miguel has the upper hand against Billy, but, with Ticks advice, Billy has the chance to turn the tables in the final round by using the Philly shell defense and countering more aggressively with his left. Billy is declared the winner by a splitdecision and reunites with Leila in the locker room, where she forgives his past mistakes and they embrace.

Name: spectre
Summarized_Text: Secretly C is an agent for Spectre, heavily involved with their plan to merge nine national intelligence agencies into the Nine Eyes Committee, thus allowing Spectre the power to take over the worldBond calls Moneypenny  shows her a video from the previous M Judi Dench, sent to Bond, after her death. She also asks Bond to attend his funeral. The previous M also left Bond a personal folder, which had the letter of guardianship for Bond to his foster father. Bond disobeys Ms orders and travels to Rome to attend Sciarras funeral As that was also mandated by the previous M in her video message to Bond. When Oberhauser addresses Bond by name, Bond is pursued across the city in his Aston Martin DB10 by the organizations assassin, Mr.  Hinx Dave Bautista, driving a Jaguar CX75. C also closes down the OO program with immediate effect. Bond and Swann stun Blofeld by setting off an explosive wristwatch in his face, and the two escape to London to prevent Nine Eyes from going online. In London, Bond and Swann meet M, Q, Bill Tanner Rory Kinnear and Moneypenny with the intention of arresting C.  Swann and Bond are separately abducted by SPECTRE operatives, while the rest of the group proceed with the plan. Bond is taken to the ruins of the old MI6 building, scheduled for demolition after Silvas bombing.

Name: spotlight
Summarized_Text: Robby asks if this is why he asked about Spotlight but Marty tells him he had another reason. Ben confirms that he is suggesting they sue the Catholic Church. They decide to investigate Geoghan, as well as Eric MacLeish, the lawyer for the victims of molestation by another priest a decade earlier. They mention they have a new editor taking the story seriously and that Robby himself is now involved and he wasnt before. Because Eric was confirmed to have defended the priests that molested the victims they were connected to through Saviano, it gives him credibility. At the Globe the next day, Sacha realizes there are several of the same terms that the directories uses when a priest is inexplicably removed from his parish. He needs to know which ones Eric has settled cases for to verify their crimes since the directories are circumstantial. He is then told Marty has been put back on the story because of this Mike flies back to Boston that afternoon. Robby meets up with Peter Conley in a hotel bar.

Name: spy
Summarized_Text: During the mission, Fines cameras and tech are acting up at Boyanovs residence. Upon touching down in Paris, Cooper is brought, not to a grand hotel, but to a seedy motel. Upon waking, Rayna brings Penny Morgan to her private plane enroute to Bulgaria, where Cooper is poisoned with her drink and knocked out. Fine then comes in and tells Cooper that his entire plan was to get close with Boyanov by faking his death, and that he was actually going to stop her. De Luca, who doesnt trust Fine, tells Boyanov that the deal is off unless Fine gets killed. De Luca accepts Coopers deal. Boyanov then leads everyone to where the nuke is  inside Renaldo the Rolls the whole time. De Luca then suddenly shoots his customer and holds everyone at gunpoint.

Name: star wars episode vii  the force awakens
Summarized_Text: Poe renames FN2187 as Finn, and expertly pilots to an escape while Finn fires the ships blasters. BB8 spots Finn looking their way and tells Rey that he is wearing Poes jacket, which they assume is stolen. Rey chases Finn down, knocks him to the ground and confronts Finn about the jacket. Finn tells them that Poe was captured by the First Order and that he helped him escape, but Poe was unfortunately killed. Finn tells her BB8 is carrying a map to Luke Skywalker and Rey is astonished, declaring that she thought Skywalker was a myth. First Order stormtroopers are now looking for Finn and the BB8 droid. Rey begins repairing the ship while Finn admits to BB8 he is not part of the resistance, but is still able to convince BB8 to tell them where the Resistance base is. Finn, Han and Chewbacca head off to find Rey, but quickly discover that she has freed herself when they spot her scaling a wall of the base. Kylo Ren confronts Finn and Rey in the snowy forest. Finn rushes to her aid and then uses the blue lightsaber to fight Ren.

Name: steve jobs

Name: straight outta compton
Summarized_Text: Later at DooTos Club, Dre and DJ Yella Neil Brown Jr.  are spinning. He tells his mom this would have never happened if he had just let his brother come on the road like he wanted. Name: tales of halloween
Summarized_Text: Sweet ToothnMikey goes through his Halloween candy while Kyle, the boyfriend of Mikeys babysitter Lizzy, tells him the urban legend of Sweet Tooth. 15 years earlier in the same town, Timmy Blake was a boy whose parents refused to let him eat candy brought home from trick or treating. Timmy killed his parents and his first taste of candy gave him an insatiable sweet tooth. Timmys evil spirit now returns as Sweet Tooth to take candy on Halloween night, even if it is already eaten. To ward off Sweet Tooth, Mikey puts a candy bar on the floor of his room before going to bed. Mikey hides under his bed as Sweet Tooth comes to take the candy bar. The Night Billy Raised HellnDressed as a masked devil, Billy Thompson is coerced by his older sister Britneys boyfriend Todd to throw an egg at Mr.  Abbadons house. The pumpkin sprouts tentacles and slithers away.

Name: tangerine
Summarized_Text: Alexandra wants to stay away from dramas and thus doesnt accompany SinDee in her quest. Alexandra goes to the bar for her performance, but no customers have arrived. Name: terminator genisys
Summarized_Text: Connor sets up two attack forces, one to strike at Skynets main defense grid in Colorado, and a second one, led by John and his trusted lieutenant Kyle Reese Jai Courtney, to infiltrate a Skynet facility in the ruins of San Francisco, California.
