Bagheera encounters Mowgli and Baloo. Bagheera tells Baloo how Shere Khan is after Mowgli and that he needs to get to safety. Mowgli confronts Shere Khan as the other animals gather to watch. Shere Khan tries to turn the animals against Mowgli by stating that man has brought the red flower into the jungle. They, along with the other animals, stand by Mowgli and against Shere Khan.  Shere Khan takes Baloo down, but before he can kill him, Raksha and the other wolves attack Shere Khan.

Name: the legend of tarzan
Summarized_Text: Other members of the tribe stand above the rocks and retaliate by killing all of Roms men. John sees three lions that he knew since they were cubs, and they greet each other as lions would. At night, the tribe sings a song that Jane says is The Legend of Tarzan. They attack the tribes camp and tie up John and Jane. Rom also shoots the tribes leader in front of everyone. John sets out to find Jane and the tribe members. George thinks its a bad idea, but he still follows John, along with seven other members. Jane yells something to Wasimbu in his language, making Rom drop the cage into the water. The two encounter Akut, now grown. The tribesmen attack Tarzan, but he fights them off with ease.

Name: the lost city of z
Summarized_Text: A truelife drama, centering on British explorer Major Percival Fawcett, who disappeared whilst searching for a mysterious city in the Amazon in the 1920s. , The Lost City of Z tells the incredible true story of British explorer Percy Fawcett, who journeys into the Amazon at the dawn of the 20th century and discovers evidence of a previously unknown, advanced civilization that may have once inhabited the region. Anxiously, Fawcett, resting his reputation entirely on the ventures success as the son of a disgraced exmilitary man, together with aidedecamp Henry Costin, will set off on a dangerous mission to Amazonia, where apart from the starvation, the infernal heat, the hostile indigenous Indian tribes and the wild animals, they will also find evidence of advanced, nonwhite civilizations. Determined to find the impossible and the ultimate missing piece of the human puzzle, the Lost City of Z, the ambitious Fawcett will visit the lush Amazonian jungles again and again in hopes of getting closer to his dream up until his equally mysterious and ungracious disappearance near 1925. Nick Riganas, Ireland, 1905 Percy Fawcett is a young British officer participating in a stag hunt on an Irish baronial estate for the benefit of the visiting Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria. The governments of Bolivia and Brazil are nearly at war over the location of their mutual boundary and its direct effect on the regions extremely lucrative rubber trade, and have asked the British government to survey it. At a large rubber plantation in the jungle owned by the Portuguese nobleman Baron DE Gondoris, the two meet Corporal Arthur Manley, who tells them that the British government advises against further exploration. Fawcett, with several guides and the Amazonian scout Tadjui, completes the mission. Fawcett dismisses such stories as insane ravings, but discovers highly advanced broken pottery and some small stone statues in the jungle that convince him of the veracity of Tadjuis story. Although a drunk, lance corporal Henry Costin, who has knowledge of the Amazon rainforest, proves a valuable assistant, as well as the whipped Indian slave scout Tadjui, which he gets assigned by a local abusive rubber plantation owner baron De Gondoris and sticks to legends about a lost golden city.

Name: the love witch
Summarized_Text: A modernday witch uses spells and magic to get men to fall in love with her, with deadly consequences. , Elaine, a beautiful young witch, is determined to find a man to love her. In her gothic Victorian apartment she makes spells and potions, and then picks up men and seduces them. , Elaine, a witch, moves to a small town expecting to find her Prince Charming. Soon Elaine seduces Wayne, but her spell is too strong. Then, Elaine seduces a man and he does not resist her charm and commits suicide. Detective Griff investigates the case and stumbles upon Elaine that believes he is the love of her life. Will Griff resist Elaines spell?Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, In the hope of finding true love, statuesque, ravenhaired young witch Elaine settles into a classic Victorian home somewhere in a scenic small town in northern California. However, as Elaines almost pathologicalobsession starts leaving an evergrowing trail of lovesmitten men in her wake, inevitably, an inquisitive detective will soon disrupt her spell. Is Elaine destined to find her Prince Charming?Nick Riganas

Name: the magnificent seven
Summarized_Text: The men then fire their guns and burn the church down. Emma and Teddy give Chisolm all the money they have, and when she mentions Bogues name, Chisolm agrees to help. Chisolm, Emma, and Teddy ride by Faraday as he tries to pick up his horse from a stablemaster. Faraday and Teddy approach the two men as Robicheaux gets a shave to discuss them joining the team. The people begin shooting at Bogues men, while the men fire back. Bogue retaliates by having his men fire a Gatling gun into town, mowing down countless people. Robicheaux returns to town and joins the fight with Billy atop a church steeple. One of the men lights it for him before aiming the gun at Faraday. Chisolm quickly takes out the two hired guns confronts Bogue right in front of the burntdown church. Bogue reaches into his ankle holster to get a gun and shoot Chisolm, but he is shot dead by Emma.

Name: the neon demon
Summarized_Text: Ruby offers Jesse friendship and to take her to a party later that night. After Ruby does her makeup, Jack gets one good look at her and announces this photo shoot will be a closed set, leaving him completely alone with Jesse. Ruby meets up with Gigi and Sarah at a diner later, where they all take notice of how quickly Jesse is rising in the model circuit. Ruby admits that there is something rather unique with Jesse, which annoys Gigi and Sarah. Meanwhile, Jesse finds something rummaging around in her motel room that night. Jesse and Gigi both take part of it, but the designer specifically wants to use Jesse as the coveted closing model. A little later, Jesse brings Dean to a private event with the designer and models. Jesse finds him waiting for her at the hotel later he asks her if she seriously wants to be like them Jesse claims they actually all want to be her, and dumps Dean. Jesse retreats back inside the house and finds Gigi and Sarah here she asks the two girls if theyre having a party before they viciously attack her. Jack stops the shoot to compliment Gigis beauty as he abruptly fires another model and has Gigi take her place, putting her in the shot right next to Sarah.

Name: the nice guys
Summarized_Text: She gives him a bottle of chocolate Yoohoo. He finds Holly in a room with a porn star watching a porno. Healy then chokes Blueface to death before Holly returns. The guys bring Amelia back to Marchs home, where Holly is watching TV with her friend Jessica Daisy Tahan. After Amelia wakes up, she tells them the truth  her mother is behind the murders as a result of the film Amelia made to protest the air pollution from car companies, and Kuttner is doing whatever it takes to stop that film from being shown. She flags down a car and asks for help. They see a projector pointed at the window, and Healy mentions seeing the reel for the film at Shadducks, meaning Mrs.  Glenn only saw Misty through the image projected on her window. John Boy and other goons are there to find the film and destroy it. He sits with Healy at the bar where they discuss their case, and March thinks that theyll be driving electric cars within five years.

Name: the purge election year
Summarized_Text: The film starts on Purge Night. Two days before Purge Night. Charlie decides to stay in her own home instead of a bunker so that she can stay on the good side of voters.  Three girls with creepy masks step out. Joe calls Laney to tell her that they have Charlie with them. Kimmy and her goons return to break into the store. They try to cut through the place with power saws, but Laney shows up and plows Kimmy down with her van.  Before the end credits begin, we hear a news report that Purge supporters are reacting to the election results with violence.

Name: the secret life of pets
Summarized_Text: Duke overhears Max barking to Katie after Duke tries to sleep in the same bed as Max. Max and Duke get taken out by a dog walker along with Mel and Buddy. Duke runs away and leaves Max behind, only to come back when animal control officers chase after them. Max and Duke get captured. Max and Duke make up that they killed her with a blender, which delights Snowball. He guides the pets to the roof in his own way toward the sewers. Almost immediately, the Animal Control officers show up and take Duke, who lets Max run away. The bus falls and causes a traffic jam while the truck swerves off the bridge and gets stuck. Before the Flushed Pets can get Max, the house pets arrive with Gidget riding Tiberius. The Flushed Pets are about to return to the sewers until a little girl sees Snowball and adopts him, making him happy once again.

Name: the shallows
Summarized_Text: Nancy struggles to escape and swims to a rock where the shark cant reach her. It starts getting darker as Nancy tries to get an opening away from the shark. Nancy yells to him to get away from the shark. She then sees the shark attack the man as he heads back to the shore. The other surfer rushes toward the rock, but the shark pulls him down. Nancy reaches for it as the shark lunges toward her. Nancy manages to get the helmet. Nancy then tosses the helmet toward the shore. Nancy jumps into the water and swims toward the buoy, and the shark follows closely. On the shore, a little boy finds the helmet camera and sees Nancys video.

Name: the void
Summarized_Text: In another part of the hospital, nursing intern Kim sits in the room of patient Cliff annoying him with her boredom and frustration at having been assigned to a hospital thats understaffed and in the process of moving out. When Cliff tells Kim hes going to sleep she leaves the room. When he comes to, Daniel is fervent about calling in the incident despite Allison and Dr.  Powells pleas for him to take it easy. Mitchell explains to him that hes investigating a mass murder that happened at a house not far away and hes there for the man that Daniel had brought in earlier that night. Suddenly the two men from the start of the film burst into the hospital and at gunpoint demand that junkie be handed over to them. As Allison gathers up what she needs someone appearing to be Dr.  Powell stands behind her. Wanting answers, Daniel allows Vincent and Simon to interrogate the junkie  threatening to break his fingers with a hammer if he doesnt tell them whats going on. Its then revealed that Vincent and Simon, who are father and son, went to the house to get revenge on those responsible for killing their family. Desperate to find Allison, Daniel convinces Vincent and Simon to come with him into the burned out section of the hospital, believing that thats where Dr.  Powell has taken her. After briefly fighting them off, Vincent sees his wife holding their baby run through a doorway and chases after them with Simon close behind.

Name: the wailing
Summarized_Text: Police officer Jonggoo, who is investigating the case, meets a mysterious young woman called Moomyeong no name in Korean, who tells him about the Japanese stranger, and later disappears. The strangers house guard dog attacks the deacon and Jonggoo. Jonggoo makes his way to the strangers house with the deacon in anger, but finds that the pictures and evidence have been burned. Jonggoo and his friends go after the stranger, and are attacked by another infected villager. He calls Jonggoo, telling him that Moomyeong is the real demon. Jonggoo finds Moomyeong near his house. She requests Jonggoo to believe her, telling him she had set a trap for the demon, but the trap will not work if Jonggoo goes back to his house. Ilgwang calls Jonggoo and tells him not to believe Moomyeong, while she in turn tells him Ilgwang is actually in league with the real demon. After being photographed by the stranger, the deacon witnesses the stranger evolving into a demon. Back at his house, Jonggoo arrives to find that Hyojin has murdered their family.

Name: the whole truth
Summarized_Text: Ramsay feels pressure to save Mike, but Mikes complete silence makes it difficult. Ramsay was the Lassiter family lawyer and came just 2 mins after the police. She testifies that she went to take a shower after the fight and when she came back, she found his corpse. Mike finally decides to talk and demands to take the stand over Ramsays objections. The prosecution calls the flight attendant, who first insists that nothing happened on the flight. Under questioning by Janelle, the attendant admits to covering up her extramarital affair with the copilot and potentially spending too much time in the cockpit to confidently deny any unusual interactions between father and son. She confronts Ramsay, who says that his duty is to save Mike, not to find the truth. She angrily leaves, making Ramsay worry about the jurys reaction to her absence, but she continues with the case. Despite the lack of proper evidence of Boones abuse, the jury acquits Mike. He and Loretta were having an affair.

Name: train to busan
Summarized_Text: The train then arrives at the abandoned Daegu station, and Seokwoo takes Suan towards the east exit where they will be picked up, while the others go towards the main exit. Seokwoo, still inside the station concourse and facing zombies, tells Suan to run. Seongkyeong takes Suan and runs to the platform, while Sanghwa fights off the horde with Seokwoo, Yongguk, and the two other baseball players. Seongkyeong, Suan, Ingil, and the homeless man barricade themselves inside a bathroom in one of the lower infected compartments, while Yongguk, Seokwoo, and Sanghwa successfully get onto a safe compartment. Seokwoo and the others exit the train, and unbeknownst to them, Yonsuk has survived the horde of zombies in the compartment by hiding in the bathroom. They go into one of the next train cars to cross over to the other side through the door, not noticing that Yonsuk, who is being chased by a zombie, is following them. Yonsuk ignores them and manages to pry the door open and runs towards the cargo train. Meanwhile, the homeless man, Suan, Seokwoo, and Seongkyeong are on the other side of the wreckage, trapped under a train full of zombies. Seokwoo approaches the cockpit but backs away when he sees Yonsuk in the conductors seat, milkyeyed and infected. Suan screams on the other side of the car platform, which attracts Yonsuk and he attempts to attack Seongkyeong and Suan.

Name: triple 9
Summarized_Text: Michael, Franco, Gabe, and Marcus meet up. Michael asks Gabe where his brother is, but Gabe says he doesnt know. Franco, Michael, Gabe, and Marcus discuss how they can get Irinas job done. Michael is intrigued and tells Franco and Michael to make the 999 happen. Gabe once again voices his objection to killing a cop, especially an innocent one.  Russell almost got charged with arms dealing but Michael was able to make the charges go away. Though it appears he was convinced and Michael apparently spares the girl. He tries to stop the bleeding and call out for Marcus.

Name: trolls band together
Summarized_Text: Poppy discovers that Branch was once part of the boy band BroZone with his brothers, Floyd, John Dory, Spruce and Clay. When Floyd is kidnapped, Branch and Poppy embark on a journey to reunite his two other brothers and rescue Floyd.

Name: underworld blood wars
Summarized_Text: Without Michael, Eve, or her coven, Selene feels alone as both vampires and lycans are hunting her. After Selene helps take the bullet out of David, they are found by two vampires who escort them back to the sanctuary, where Selene is introduced to the recruits and is told she will teach them how to fight against lycans. Meanwhile, it is revealed here that Semira and Varga are secret lovers, with Semira conspiring to get rid of Selene and the others leaders in order to step up as a vampire elder. Semira catches them and kills Thomas in front of David before he and Selene escape. Semira sends a vampire named Alexia Daisy Head out to find Selene and David. Selene and David head to the sanctuary of the Nordic vampire coven. The vampires fight back as Selene and David try to help. Marius finds Selene and fights her on the ice. She fights against Marius once more while David takes on Semira. Selene, David, and Lena are then initiated as the new vampire elders.

Name: war dogs
Summarized_Text: Efraim has left his uncle and formed his own company, AEY, which fills orders for arms placed by the US government due to the ongoing War in Iraq. Efraim offers him a job at AEY, and even though David and Iz both vehemently oppose the war, David eventually agrees, telling his girlfriend that he has begun selling his cotton sheets to the US government through Efraims contacts. With Iz discovering Davids true business by overhearing a conversation between him and Efraim, leaving her upset, David and Efraim have to fly to Jordan to free up their cargo or risk being blacklisted by the US Government for failing to deliver. Filling this order proves to be nighimpossible for such a relatively small company, particularly in that there is a global shortage on AK47 ammunition, but the two end up lucking into an encounter with legendary US arms dealer Henry Girard Bradley Cooper. Efraim agrees, although David expresses discomfort working with a man who is on a terrorist watchlist. Meanwhile, Iz grows frustrated with Davids continuing string of lies about his work, and leaves to live with her mother. David protests, leading Efraim to destroy the partnership contract between he and David on The Afghan Deal and go ahead with his plan to cut Henry out and short the workers repackaging the rounds on their pay. nHenry retaliates by having David kidnapped from his hotel room, beaten, and held at gunpoint before leaving him alive, as well as seemingly having his Albanian driver killed. David returns to working as a massage therapist and convinces Iz to move back in with him by telling her the truth about everything he had been doing for AEY. Shortly after this, David and Efraim are both arrested by the FBI.

Name: warcraft
Summarized_Text: GulDan Daniel Wu, a powerful orc warlock, unites the orc clans and forms the Horde, and creates a portal to the world of Azeroth. Once it is operational, GulDan leads a small warband to capture prisoners on Azeroth and sacrifice them to bring the rest of the Horde through the portal. Khadgar persuades Stormwinds king, Llane Wrynn Dominic Cooper, to consult Medivh Ben Foster, the renowned Guardian of Tirisfal, and Llane sends Anduin and Khadgar to Medivhs stronghold, Karazhan, to inform him of the Fel magics presence on Azeroth. Anduin, Khadgar and Medivh join a scouting team following traces of Fel magic, but are ambushed by orcs. nKing Llane frees Garona in exchange for loyalty to Stormwind, and she leads the humans to spy on the orc camp, where they learn of GulDans plan to bring the Horde to Azeroth. While studying the book he took from Karazhan, Khadgar learns that GulDan could not have opened the portal on his own he had help from someone on Azeroth. Both Anduin  Khadgar suspect that Medivh was the one who opened the portal gates for Orcs on the Azeroth side. Medivh, now in a halfdemonic state, starts to open the portal to Draenor, and GulDan sacrifices the captured human villagers to allow the rest of the Horde to enter Azeroth. Llane leads the human army in an assault on the orc camp, while Anduin and Khadgar fight Medivh and destroy the demon that had begun to manifest on the outside. When Medivh eventually dies, the portal closes, leaving Llane, Garona and a small number of human soldiers to fight the orcs.

Name: xmen apocalypse
Summarized_Text: As they step closer, Caliban is defended by Psylocke Olivia Munn, a mutant with her own metal sword and a psychic katana. As Magneto speaks to Charles, Apocalypse sees the opportunity to link his mind to Charless, which also lets him get into Cerebro and connect to anyone he wants. The others pull Charles out of the room, only to encounter Apocalypse and the Horsemen appearing before them. Magneto pulls Charles in his chair and takes him. Alex releases a blast that causes a powerful explosion. However, he failed to save Alex, which Scott finds out about just as he and his friends return.  He orders Psylocke to execute him. After the battle, Psylocke quietly walks away.

Name: yoga hosers
Summarized_Text: The girls work in the Eh2Zed convenience store run by Colleen Cs father, who has a girlfriend Tabitha who the girls hate and Tabitha doesnt seem to care for them either. The girls also take yoga classes with Yogi Beara, who is being harassed by Warner Brothers because they own a cartoon. Yogi believes yoga is 90 percent physical with the other half being mental. This becomes critical to the plot Yogi doesnt see yoga as peaceful, but rather as being more like one of the martial arts. Yogis disdain for what passes for yoga in P. E.  class gets the girls excused. And yes, people say Eh? Things dont work out and they end up spending time with Satan worshipers. For much of the second half, the girls are with Guy Lapointe, an author who is investigating several murders, including Toilet Paper Man.

Name: your name
Summarized_Text: Mitsuha walks to school and meets up with her friends Katsuhiko and Sayaka.  Back in Itomori, Mitsuha cuts her hair. However, they will need to convince the mayor, Mitsuhas father, of the severity. Meanwhile, Mitsuha wakes up in Takis body in the present day and sees the town destroyed. Heartbroken, she leaves the train, but Taki senses something and calls out to her. They blow up the power grid with explosives, switching on emergency power. She sees that Taki, instead of writing his name, wrote I LOVE YOU instead. Simultaneously, they ask, Can I ask you your name?We are left to infer they will recover their memories and finally be together, in love.

Name: zootopia
Summarized_Text: Nicks friend, Flash Raymond S.  Persi is able to run the plate number for them but, naturally, takes forever to do so. They push the door open to see Manchas on all fours, growling viciously at them. He says that Bogo gave them 48 hours, which means they have ten left to find Otterton. His mother bought him a new uniform and he was excited to become part of the group, despite the fact that he was the only predator to join. Judy and Nick find the footage of Manchas and see that he was netted and hauled away by timber wolves. Gazelle hosts a peaceful protest against discrimination, despite backlash, and savage attacks continue in the city as more predators go primal. But Judy claims that shes no hero and says shes done the opposite of what she wanted to make the world a better place. She begins to cry and admits that she was a jerk to him and really is a dumb bunny as he once said. As they near the exit toward the police station they are called from behind by Mayor Bellwether, accompanied by two rams in police uniform.

Wilf decides to convince Henry to help him murder his mother in order to prevent losing his land and his son, holding Henrys girlfriend Shannon Kaitlyn Bernard, with whose relationship Arlette opposes, at stake. Wilf intends to bury Arlette in one of his corn fields however Henry collapses from the ordeal, prompting Wilf to dump her body into a dry well where her corpse is soon fed upon by rats. While searching the house, he questions Wilf about Arlette, with Wilf stating she left them on her own accord. In a climactic scene, Wilf is confronted by the ghost of his wife, surrounded by the rats which ate her. Henrys body is delivered to Wilf, which, like his mothers body, has been chewed through by rats. No one attends Henrys funeral, except for Wilf. Wilf attempts to sell his land to Shannons father Neal McDonough, who bluntly tells Wilf to leave his property and never come back. Wilf moves to Omaha to find work, but cannot escape being followed by rats. Arlette, Henry, and Shannons corpses have appeared in front of the frightened Wilf. Brandishing the same butchers knife used to kill his mother, Henry tells Wilf that his death will be quick.

Name: 47 meters down
Summarized_Text: Louis and Benjamin are the first two to get into the shark cage. After Louis and Benjamin take their turn in the cage, Kate and Lisa get into it. She eventually reaches Taylor who tells Kate that he is going to send Javier down with a cable to bring the cage back to the surface. Kate goes back to the cage and tells Lisa what Taylor told her. Since Kate is running low on oxygen, Lisa decides to go and bring Javier to the cage. She swims up and tells Taylor that she has attached the cable to the cage and that Javier was killed. He tells her to get back to the cage. Lisa swims back to the cage and Taylor begins raising them to the surface. Kate sees the tank coming down and goes out to get it. Kate gets the tank and is coming back to the cage when she spots a shark.

Name: a ghost story
Summarized_Text: He sees another ghost inside the house next door wordlessly, the ghost tells him that she is waiting for someone, but cannot remember who. When the wife comes home with a man, the ghost hurls books from the shelf and turns lights on and off. The ghost picks at the wall but cannot retrieve the note.  As the ghost manages to remove a piece of the wall concealing the note, bulldozers level it and the house next door. The mans ghost watches as a skyscraper is built on the land. He watches as the familys young daughter writes a note and hides it under a rock. Decades later, the ghost watches as his past self and wife move into the house. After the man tells his wife that he is ready to move out, the ghost sits at the piano, striking the keys and causing the noise that wakes the couple. As the wife moves out, the ghost sees his earlier ghost watching her leave.

Name: alien covenant
Summarized_Text: In 2104, 11 years after the Prometheus expedition, the colonization ship Covenant is bound for a remote planet, Origae6, with a crew of 15, two thousand colonists in stasis and 1,140 human embryos aboard. A small, pale, alien creature neomorph bursts from Ledwards back, killing him, and then kills Karine. The neomorphs attack the remaining crew members and kill one. The crew manages to kill a neomorph before David, who survived the Prometheus mission, scares away the other, and leads the crew to a temple in a city full of humanoid Engineer corpses. After the crew members tell David of their mission, they attempt to contact the Covenant but are prevented by fierce storms. The surviving neomorph infiltrates the structure and kills crew member Rosenthal. David tries to communicate with the creature, but is horrified when Oram kills it. Pilot Tennessee arrives in another lander to extract Daniels, Lope, and Walter, who claims David has expired. After an encounter outside the ship, they kill the Xenomorph and return to the Covenant. The next morning, Daniels and Tennessee find out that another Xenomorph burst from Lopes chest, killing him, and is loose on the Covenant.

Name: all the money in the world
Summarized_Text: His mother, Gail Michelle Williams, and father, John Paul Getty Jr.  Andrew Buchan, are struggling to raise their children. Sometime later, John Jr.  gets a telegram from his father, urging John Jr.  to come to Rome for a new job opportunity. They first call Gail, but she tells them that she doesnt have any money. Gail goes to Gettys mansion and, while waiting, she meets Chace. They also see a list of his known associates, which include Cinquanta. After looking throughout the building, they find out that Paul has been moved. When Gail and Chace arrive, they dont see Paul, but they conclude he took off towards the town. Paul runs into one of the kidnappers, who almost kills Paul until Cinquanta knocks the man out and allows Paul to go.

Name: american assassin
Summarized_Text: Mitch physically trains to be ready for the confrontation. Unknown to him, the watchful American government is impressed with his training. CIA agent Irene Kennedy Sanaa Lathan recruits him for a black ops team and sends him to Dan Hurley Michael Keaton, a former Navy Seal, for further training. World events move faster than expected, so Dan takes Mitch to Istanbul. In Turkey they meet with CIA agent Annika Shiva Negar. Mitch and Annika pretend to be newlyweds in order to cover their real mission prevent the jihadist construction of a nuclear bomb. Things dont go according to plan so Mitch improvises. In another plot twist, Annika works for the Iranian government. In the aftermath, an Iranian military man secretly tied to the creation of the bomb publicly blames the problems of his country on the U.  S. , which he promises to eliminate.

Name: american made
Summarized_Text: He then lets Barry take the plane out for a ride. However, the DEA raid one of their compounds, and Barry is arrested. Despite Lucys questioning, Barry insists he cannot tell her a thing, leading her to lose trust in him. His first flight to meet with the Contras ends with them robbing his stuff instead of taking his guns. Barry gets four other men to help him on his trips when he realizes the workload is too much for one guy to pull off. On one mission, Barry crashlands and loses a significant portion of the drugs. As he waits outside while she speaks to a lawyer on the phone, Barry tries to bribe the agents with caddies while also insisting he will walk away scotfree. The White House later releases the photos as propaganda, and Barry is seen in the photos. He is told that they were not supposed to be released to the public until after the cartel members were caught. The last thing we see is her working as a cashier at a coffee shop, still wearing a bracelet that Barry gave her.

Name: annabelle creation
Summarized_Text: Twelve years later, Samuel and Esther welcomes a nun and six orphaned girls to his home. He tells them that only a locked room that belonged to Bee and Esthers room would be offlimits for the girls. The crippled girl, Janice, manages to sneak into Bees room during the night and finds a doll locked inside a closet. What has Janice unleashed in Bees room?Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, Mr Samuel Mullins Anthony LaPaglia handcrafts wooden toys and dolls. Immediately, strange things start happening in the house. The Mullinses appear to know and understand whats going on, hinting its been dealt with before, but its not enough to save them all this time. Despite having been told not to enter Bees locked bedroom, Janice, a young orphan crippled by polio, is awakened by a noise, discovers a note saying find me, and sneaks into the room, which has mysteriously become unlocked. This releases a powerful demon who begins to terrorize the girls, displaying a special interest in Janice.  Has the Mullins remote haven transformed into an infernal trap?Nick Riganas

Name: atomic blonde
Summarized_Text: nMeanwhile Spyglass has contacted David Percival MI6 top man in Berlin to inform him that he has delivered the list to Gasciogne. Percival refuses to take Spyglass since Gasciogne didnt show up and he still doesnt have the list. Percival says that he has never met Spyglass. Percival, having been tipped off, kills him and takes the List for himself. He then meets with Bremovych, which Lasalle photographs. nPercival meets Lorraine  now informs her that Spyglass has memorized the list and wants to defect. But now Lasalle knows that Percival has met Bremovych  threatens him. When Lorraine arrives too late to save her, she discovers the photographs taken by Lasalle proving Percival to be Satchel. As Percival burns his safehouse and attempts to flee, Lorraine tracks him down, kills him, and takes the List. Lorraine reveals that he had met Bremovych as the real target that day was not Spyglass, but Lorraine.

Name: baby driver
Summarized_Text: Babys supposedly final job for Doc goes awry after the triggerhappy Bats Jamie Foxx, who developed an immediate dislike to Baby, shoots a security guard. However, while Baby is on a fancy dinner date with Debora, Doc appears and insists that he join another heists crew, threatening to hurt Debora if he refuses. Afterwards, Bats forces Baby to stop at Deboras diner, unaware of Baby and Deboras romance, and nearly kills her in a holdup. Disgusted, Baby refuses to drive the crew, causing Bats to hit him. Baby rams the car into rebar, impaling and killing Bats. Baby shoots Buddy and flees with Debora as the police close in. Baby seeks help from Doc, who initially refuses, blaming Baby for ruining the heist. Buddy ambushes them in the parking garage and rams Doc with a stolen police car, killing him. Debora disarms Buddy with a crowbar and Baby shoots him, causing him to fall to his death. Fleeing Atlanta, Baby and Debora run into a police roadblock.

Name: beauty and the beast
Summarized_Text: Belle rides Philippe back to the castle. Belle also meets Mrs.  Potts Emma Thompson, Chips mother and kitchen stewardess who is now a teapot, plus Chip himself Plumette Gugu Mcbatharaw, the maid and Lumieres girlfriend turned into a featherduster resembling a peacock Madame DE Garderobe Audra Mcdowell, an Italian opera singer who is now a wardrobe and Maestro Cadenza Stanley Tucci, Garderobes husband and head musician who is now a harpsichord. The Beast tries to get Belle to join him for dinner, but he is too abrasive as he pounds on her bedroom door. The Beast storms off and insults his servants. Belle tries to fight them off until the Beast shows up and fights them himself. Gaston and LeFou think Maurice is just crazy. Gaston tries to cover it up by putting on the nice guy act, but Maurice already sees who Gaston really is and makes it clear that he will never allow Gaston to marry Belle. Cogsworth goes to warn the Beast, who is too depressed to care about what happens. Karma then goes for Gaston as the bridge he is standing on crumbles, and he falls to his death.

Name: blade runner 2049
Summarized_Text: They deduce that there is only one area nearby that can account for the type of wood and such high radiation readings. Since Deckard is in Wallaces hands now, K needs to kill him to prevent Deckard from giving information that will lead them to Freysa in fact, she is convinced that Deckard would happily sacrifice his life for his daughter, who will be shown to the world and lead their army when the time is right. Wallace insinuates that their instant connection wasnt coincidence their first meeting was set up from the beginning, with the intention that they would end up together and reproduce either because Deckard himself is a Replicant, or because Rachael was designed to his preferences with mathematical precision. Deckard is shocked and moved, but through the emotional anguish and against all his instincts, he ultimately dismisses this Rachael as a fake, stating that the real one had green eyes. He orders Luv to take Deckard to one of the offworld colonies, where they have people experienced in torture with the means to make him talk. In the meanwhile, Luv takes off with a handcuffed Deckard in a Spinner with two escorting vehicles, and flies along the LA shoreline. She reenters the vehicle, trying to free Deckard from his cuffs as the Spinner is being dragged into the sea by tidal waves, but then K enters. K takes Deckard to Dr.  Stellines office.

Name: brawl in cell block 99
Summarized_Text: During the night, Lauren is kidnapped by men under orders of Eleazar. On the second day of his incarceration, Bradley is visited by the Placid Man, who informs Bradley that he works for Eleazar. During the night, a young brutal guard named Wilson escorts Bradley to another, larger cell in block 99, where Eleazar, Roman, and two other gangsters are located. Bradley locks the second guard inside a cell. Warden Tuggs and his men arrive at block 99, but Bradley threatens to kill his two hostages. The Placid Man and the abortionist follow Eleazars instructions and drive Lauren unharmed to Gils house. Bradley destroys the cell phone, then reminds Warden Tuggs that he still has 60 seconds of freedom remaining. Warden Tuggs and his men finally enter the cell. Warden Tuggs orders Bradley to turn around with his hands behind his head. Bradley says 78 days and turns around to face Warden Tuggs and his guards.

Name: bright
Summarized_Text: Ward and Jakoby ride together, with Ward openly blaming Jakoby for the shooting incident. Ward is later approached by Captain Perez Andrea Navedo, along with two men  Yamahara Kenneth Choi and Arkashian Bobby Naderi  who order Ward to record Jakoby admitting that he let Wards shooter get away. The officers find Tikka, who is in possession of the wand. They want the wand for themselves, and they order Ward to go along with it and kill Jakoby, or he dies as well. Ward and Jakoby take Tikka and head into their van as the gangsters start attacking. She explains that she took the wand because she knew Leilah wanted to bring back the Dark Lord, and she had sent Larika to kill her, but Tikka took the wand herself. Ward and Jakoby bring Leilah back to the house. Ward and Jakoby manage to kill the elves, and Jakoby appears to shoot Leilah dead. When she tries to get the wand, Ward grabs it himself. Although Jakoby tries to explain everything that happened, Ward denies that there was ever a wand, and that gangsters killed the corrupt officers.

Name: call me by your name
Summarized_Text: With not much else to do, the two begin spending time together, with Elio showing Oliver around. Elio has sex with Marzia again, and then that evening goes to see Oliver. Oliver tells Elio, Call me by your name, and Ill call you by mine.   The next day, Oliver goes into town, and Elio follows him. Elio just wants to be with Oliver, he says. He doesnt want Oliver to go. He says they always treated him like one of the family, as a son in law. Elio goes and sits in front of the fireplace, eyes welling up with tears as dinner is about to be served.

Name: cars 3
Summarized_Text: He tells Lightning that its time for a new look. Lightning looks back and sees Cruz still at the start, spinning her wheels. Cruz and Lightning are back in Macks trailer, with Cruz next to a large trophy. Sterling says that Lightning will race as planned. Smokey and Lightning head outside, and Lightning says if he doesnt win, hell never race again, and he doesnt want what happened to Doc to happen to him. Cruz and Lightning take their positions at the starting line, and Smokey tells him he has three laps to catch up to her. Repeating the racing exercise one last time before the race, Lightning starts drafting behind Cruz, and then he pulls out in front of her. The race starts, and Lightning starts passing the other racers. Theres a wreck on the track, and Lightning pulls into the pits, telling Smokey that he needs Cruz back. Back at Radiator Springs, Cruz and Lightning show off their new looks.

Name: coco
Summarized_Text: Imelda offers Miguel a blessing but on the condition that he abandon his musical pursuits when he returns to the Land of the Living Miguel refuses and attempts to seek Ernestos blessing. In return, Hctor asks Miguel to take his photo back to the Land of the Living so he can visit his daughter before she forgets him and he disappears completely. Ernesto welcomes Miguel as his descendant, but Hctor confronts them, imploring Miguel to take his photo. To maintain his legacy, Ernesto steals the photo and has Miguel and Hctor thrown into a cenote pit. Miguel realizes that Hctor is his actual greatgreatgrandfather and that Coco is Hctors daughter, the only living person who still remembers him. Miguel reveals that Hctors decision to return home to her and Coco resulted in his death, and Imelda and Hctor reconcile. Imelda blesses Miguel with no conditions attached so he can return to the Land of the Living, where he plays a song for Coco that Hctor wrote for her during her childhood. The song sparks her memory of Hctor and revitalizes her, and she gives Miguel the tornout piece of the photo from the ofrenda, which shows Hctors face. One year later, Miguel proudly presents the family ofrenda  featuring a photo of the now deceased Coco and the restored photo of Hctor and Imelda  to his new baby sister. In the Land of the Dead, Hctor and Imelda join Coco for a visit to the living Riveras as Miguel sings and plays for his dead and living relatives.

Name: crooked house
Summarized_Text: Sophia wants Charles to investigate Aristides death, for she believes he was murdered by a member of his sprawling and idiosyncratic family. Charles suspects that this was due to Josephines habit of spying on the other family members and the killer thus wanting to silence her. The discovery of love letters between Brenda and Laurence gives Taverner enough evidence to arrest them for Aristides murder and the attempt on Josephine. Sophia notes that the letters could have been forged, and Edith insists on the best lawyer to represent Brenda and Laurence. Charles returns to the estate when Josephines nanny is fatally poisoned by hot chocolate that she had prepared for herself and Josephine. The coroner finds that the nanny died of cyanide poisoning, Charles suspects Edith, who used cyanide to kill moles. Just then, Sophia tells him that Edith has left with Josephine. Charles and Sophia take off in pursuit of Edith, who left a note for Charles to find in his car. Lady Edith had worked out that Josephine was the killer. As Charles and Sophia catch up, she drives off the edge of a quarry, killing herself and Josephine.

Name: cult of chucky
Summarized_Text: The previous Childs Play film ended with Nica being arrested for Chucky killing her family Nicas niece Alice in Chuckys clutches Tiffany still possessing the body of actress Jennifer Tilly subsequently mailing Chucky to a nowadult Andy Barclay the protagonist in the first three films and Andy shooting Chucky when the package arrives. He has her transferred to a lowsecurity institution. He begins to kiss Nica when one of the Chuckys smashes him on the head with a glass bottle. Andy shows up and demands to be committed, fighting the guards until they lock him in a rubber room. Unsure how she will react having acknowledged that she killed her real child, Dr.  Foley puts Madeleine on suicide watch. Dr.  Foley returns to his office to find Nica there she had been drugged by ClawChucky. Dr.  Foley tells her he is going to pin the new deaths on her and write a book on her murders. The Chuckys come up with a plan. ClawChucky successfully possesses Nica and in so doing, is able to allow her to walk again.

Name: darkest hour
Summarized_Text: She goes to their bedroom to tell her husband that he has become rude and overbearing, and she would like others to love and respect him the way she does. Churchill receives an official telegram from King George VI Ben Mendelsohn inviting him to meet at Buckingham Palace. George and Chamberlain are meeting prior to Churchills arrival, with George having a lack of enthusiasm for having to pick Churchill, but Chamberlain says its because Churchill was the only one with full support from the opposition. In his speech, he tells the men that he has already begun to form his coalition, and that he plans to wage war against the enemy to ensure victory at all costs and by any means necessary, counter to the previous discussions of peace talks with Germany. Lord Halifax sits with Chamberlain outside after Churchills speech. Halifax expresses his doubts over Churchills capabilities as a leader. Chamberlain tells Halifax that he has cancer and fears he may not live to see his country at peace. Halifax comes up with a plan to try and get Churchill out by trying to have a vote of no confidence so that Chamberlains policies may be reinstated. Churchill argues fiercely with Halifax over their opposing views on how to handle the ongoing war. King George visits Churchill over Mussolinis desire to barter with Hitler.

Name: despicable me 3
Summarized_Text: Gru meets his longlost, charming, cheerful, and more successful twin brother Dru, who wants to team up with him for one last criminal heist. , After he is fired from the AntiVillain League for failing to take down the latest bad guy to threaten humanity, Gru Steve Carell finds himself in the midst of a major identity crisis. But when a mysterious stranger shows up to inform Gru that he has a longlost twin brother  a brother who desperately wishes to follow in his twins despicable footsteps  one former supervillain will rediscover just how good it feels to be bad. As Gru Steve Carell and Lucy Wilde Kristen Wiig attempt to stop him from stealing the largest diamond in the world, they fail as he flies away. Gru and Lucy are fired by Valerie Da Vinci Jenny Slate from the AntiVillain League, and are jobless. Dru wants Gru to team up for one more heist, to which he gives in. Without Lucy knowing, they plan to steal the largest diamond in the world from Bratt, as the Minions get themselves in prison. However, are Gru and his polar opposite Dru a match made in heaven?Nick Riganas, Former villain Gru Steve Carell is now an agent for the AntiVillain League AVL. He and his partner and new wife Lucy Kristen Wiig are sent to foil the plans of Balthazar Bratt Trey Parker, a former child actor from the 1980s who has turned evil. As a result of failing to capture Bratt, Gru and Lucy are fired from the AVL by its unreasonable new Director Valerie Da Vinci Jenny Slate, following the retirement of the AVLs former Director, Silas Ramsbottom Steve Coogan.

Name: disobedience
Summarized_Text: nThe next day Ronit visits her fathers grave. Esti admits thatnshe does not want Ronit to leave again past feelings are reignited and they kiss, at firstntimidly as Ronit pulls back, and then passionately. Esti rushes home, tense shenalmost embraces Dovid but their marriage still lacks the passion she has with Ronit. Ronit waits for Esti at the school gates, where Esti tells her about the formal complaint Hindanand Lev have submitted against her. He tries to get closento her but his yearning to be intimate with his wife is rebuked once again by a confused Esti. They both try to convince each other, andnthemselves, they are happy in their lives. When Ronitnannounces that she has booked a flight back to New York that night, Dovid seems relievednand quietly asked his wife what she plans on doing now. In the middle of the night, Esti leaves the house whilst Dovid is asleep and returns to thenhotel room with a pregnancy test. Esti returns from hiding and, having heard everything, announcesnher pregnancy. They clutch hands as Dovidntakes to the podium, where he struggles to deliver the official speech on the Ravs passing.

Name: downsizing
Summarized_Text: Dave and Carol boast to their friends how great things are as they live in a community for small people called Leisureland. A guy at a bar then starts to get belligerent over the fact that small people appear to get better benefits over normalsized people, claiming they dont contribute to the economy like everyone else does. Paul then says he has been seeing someone. Paul is having dinner with Kristen Kerri Kenney, a single mom. She takes Paul to Gladys Rose Bianco, a woman dying of cancer who apparently lost her husband when he died during the downsizing process. Paul gives Ngoc Lan some percocet to give to Gladys for the pain, and also recommends turning her on her side so she doesnt get bed sores. Dusan offers Paul a chance to get away by joining him and his friend Joris Konrad Udo Kier in going to Norway where the first small community was created. Paul says goodbye to Ngoc Lan, Dusan, and Joris. Paul returns to Leisureland with Ngoc Lan and continues to help her in her work throughout the slums.

Name: dunkirk
Summarized_Text: He escapes the gunfire and makes it to the beach, where thousands of British soldiers line the beaches waiting to be evacuated while a few hundred others of soldiers lay dead, scattered around the beach. They board a skiff back to the shore. Back on the beach, the surviving British soldiers join up with a small group of Scottish soldiers heading to a boat within the tide. The soldiers make it out, except for Gibson, who gets caught on something and drowns. The ensuing struggle leads to George falling to the bottom of the boat and hitting his head hard. Peter goes to tend to his wounds, while the soldier stops and sits quietly. 17 bomber as he runs out of fuel and heads toward the beach to make a safe landing. Meanwhile, Peter, Collins, and the shivering soldier pull as many men onto the boat as they can, including Alex and Tommy. After taking out another German bomber before it can destroy the mole, Farrier lands his plane slowly by the shore. He sets his plane on fire and is soon captured by German soldiers.

Name: ferdinand
Summarized_Text: Three young calves wait to see which of the older bulls will get picked to fight a matador. The matador chooses Ferdinands dad voice of Jeremy Sisto. Ferdinand is brought back to Casa Del Toro where he meets a coaching goat named Lupe voice of Kate McKinnon. Lupe brings Ferdinand to his stable where he meets three mischievous hedgehogs  Una voice of Gina Rodriguez, Dos voice of Daveed Diggs, and Cuatro voice of Gabriel Iglesias. Guapo gets way too nervous, Angus cant see, and Bones is too small. Valiente tells Ferdinand if hes not a fighter, he just becomes meat. He even heads to the slaughterhouse to save Valiente and Guapo. Juan and Paco see it on TV, and Juan goes to get Nina so they can save Ferdinand. A huge crowd gathers at the arena to watch the fight. Ferdinand is forced out into the ring and poked by the workers so that he can fight.

Name: fifty shades darker
Summarized_Text: Jack invites Ana out for drinks. Later at home, Christian informs Ana that he bought SIP and will essentially be her and Jacks boss. Ana asks Christian if he has a file on her as well. In Christians room, Ana sees a picture of his birth mother, who slightly resembles Ana. Christian invites Ana to a ball. In the parking garage at Christians home, he and Ana find that Anas car has been vandalized. Ana and Christian later go on their romantic getaway on Christians boat, which he named after Grace. Christian later has Jack fired. Christian asks Ana to move in with her, and she agrees. As they go to pick up Anas stuff from her place, Leila is there, having been stalking both Ana and Christian.

Name: first reformed
Summarized_Text: Ernst Toller is the pastor of the First Reformed Church in Snowbridge, New York, who is struggling with a crisis of faith. Mary finds a suicide vest belonging to her husband in their garage. Mary and Toller discuss going to the police, but Toller feels it would worsen Michaels state. Just before their next appointment, Michael sends Toller a text message asking to meet in a local park. Toller arrives to find Michael dead of a selfinflicted shotgun wound. Meanwhile, plans are underway to celebrate the 250th anniversary of First Reformed with a service attended by the mayor, the governor, and Edward Balq, one of Abundant Lifes key financial backers and the owner of a polluting factory. Toller has Michaels laptop computer, which he took after Michaels suicide to prevent the police from discovering Michaels radicalism and making trouble for Mary. One night, Mary visits Toller in the parsonage of the church, and he plays Michaels role in a nonsexual rite of physical intimacy that the couple used to perform. Preparing for his role in the ceremony, he puts on the explosive vest, and arms it. When he sees Mary entering for the ceremony, he removes the vest and instead wraps himself in barbed wire under his alb.

Name: geostorm
Summarized_Text: He moves through the station when the windows start to blow out, causing Makmoud to get sucked out into space. Secretary of State Leonard Dekkom Ed Harris talks to Max and suggests that he get Jake to go up there since he knows Dutch Boy better than anyone involved, but Max thinks it wouldnt help to ask Jake. Using their dads old phone number, Max decrypts the message to learn that Jake believes someone within the White House is responsible. In order to stop the geostorm from happening, they need to reboot the system with kill codes, which are with the President as they are biometric and require his fingerprints and eye scan. Max and Sarah head to the Democratic National Convention in Orlando, where Max learns that a huge thunderstorm is about to hit the area. She creates a diversion to get the other Secret Service agents away while she gets Palma. The car blows up, but they are not inside. Jake contacts Max and says the kill codes will only stop the geostorm but not the selfdestruct sequence. Jake prepares to die despite Max trying to find a way to help. Once they do so, they manage to stop the geostorm, bringing all the crazy weather to a halt.

Name: geralds game
Summarized_Text: While Gerald takes Viagra, Jessie feeds a stray dog outside, but when reentering the house notices the door is left ajar. Gerald takes a second Viagra and leaves his glass of water on the same shelf. Gerald stands up and begins talking, but Jessie notices his body remains on the floor. Gerald and the selfassured Jessie tell things about herself and Gerald that she never had the courage to acknowledge. Gerald begins to call Jessie Mouse, which unsettles her. Gerald teases Jessie about the disfigured man she saw, who he calls the man made of moonlight, and points out what he suspects is a bloody footprint on the floor. The adult Jessie smashes the water glass and cuts her wrist in a way that enables her to peel back the skin, allowing her bloody hand to slip through the cuff. But each night the man made of moonlight still appears before her as she falls asleep. This explains why he did not harm Jessie in the house and also why Geralds face was disfigured. Jessie arrives at court as the moonlight man is being sentenced, and calls for his attention.

Name: get out
Summarized_Text: Dean and Missy tell Jeremy that maybe its time for him to go to bed. Rose finds Chris and he tells her how weird everything is and that his phone was unplugged again. Rod tells Chris to take a picture of the black guy and he will see if he remembers him. Chris and Rose go for a walk and Chris tells her that hes sure he recognized the guy and that something strange is definitely going on. Apparently Chris isnt the first black guy Rose has been with after all!Rose returns and Chris says that he needs the keys to put their bags in the car. Missy and Dean tell Chris that they dont want him to leave.  Dean tells Jeremy to go get Chris.  When Chris asks Rod how he found him, Rod explains that he works for the TSA and that everything will be alright.

Name: ghost in the shell
Summarized_Text: The Major and Batou are driving around the city. The Major says she knows where to find the hacker. He and The Major kill a number of goons before they head off to find the hacker. Aramaki warns Cutter who he is threatening since Aramaki answers to the Prime Minister and not Hanka. The hacker controls two sanitation workers to ram their truck into Ouelets car. As she leaves, The Major gets in contact with Aramaki, who informs her that Ouelet is dead and that Cutter says she killed her, though they both know the truth. They allow Cutter to eavesdrop on their conversation as they plan their next move. However, the spider tank hits Kuze and severely damages him. She uses all her strength, causing her arm to rip off as she destroys the spider tank. Aramaki sends his own man, Saito Yutaka Izumihara, to take down the sniper to save The Major.

Name: gifted
Summarized_Text: As soon as she introduces herself to the children, Mary demands to know if shes the boss, and upon confirmation, demands that she call Frank right away and tell him to get her out of there. When Frank comes to pick Mary up, Bonnie catches up to him on the front yard and tells him she thinks Mary might be a gifted child. Bonnie then does her own research and finds out that Marys mom Diane was a Math genius, also, working on one of the Millennium Prize problems when she apparently took her own life and was survived by her brother Frank. Frank is called to the Principals office, where she tells him she can get a full ride for Mary at a nearby school for the gifted. Evelyn shows up at Franks door soon after and meets Mary for the first time. She criticizes Franks lifestyle choices and demands to take Mary away with her to Boston. In the end, though, Evelyn wants to settle by putting Mary in foster care in proximity to Franks house and making her go to the school for gifted children. Frank is desolate, but is determined to do what everyone seems to think is best for Mary, when he finds out thanks to Bonnie that the foster family has put Marys beloved oneeyed cat up for adoption. When Mary and Frank return to the guesthouse, Roberta takes Mary to the car, and Frank orders the tutors out. Since she asks, he tells Evelyn that if she refuses, hell take the folder away and wait to publish it until after Evelyn dies.

Name: gods own country
Summarized_Text: Young farmer Johnny Saxby numbs his daily frustrations with binge drinking and casual sex, until the arrival of a Romanian migrant worker for lambing season ignites an intense relationship that sets Johnny on a new path.   Isolated young sheep farmer Johnny Saxby numbs his daily frustrations with binge drinking and casual sex, until the arrival of a Romanian migrant worker Gheorghe, employed for the lambing season, ignites an intense relationship that sets Johnny on a new path. During the busy birthing season, Martin hires Gheorghe Ionescu, a Romanian migrant farm worker, for a one week period. In their solitude, their relationship turns more intimate, something that has never happened before for Johnny. Gheorghe, who is more experienced in true matters of the heart than Johnny, knows the current status of their relationship is unsustainable, something that Johnny may never get a point to in never having been there. For the backbreaking lambing season, Martin hires for a week Gheorghe Ionescu, an actually experienced Romanian migrant farm worker, with more professional dedication.

Name: good time
Summarized_Text: Stopped by police, Nick panics and runs Nick is arrested while Connie escapes. Connie attempts to secure a bail bond, but needs 10,000 more to get Nick out of jail. Connie learns that Nick has been hospitalized after a fight with an inmate. Hearing screams from the other room, Connie realizes the man he broke out of the hospital is not Nick but a man released on parole, Ray. Searching for the bottle, Connie and Ray are discovered by a security guard Connie beats him unconscious. As police arrive, Connie steals the mans uniform and Ray pours LSD down the mans throat to make him incoherent. Connie convinces the police that the guard was the intruder and destroys a hard drive containing security footage. Ray and Connie break into the guards highrise apartment. Ray begins drinking and Connie tells him he is a leech on society. Connie flees with the drugs, but is caught by police.

Name: guardians of the galaxy vol 2
Summarized_Text: On Egos ship, the three talk to Mantis, who shows off her powers by seeing into their minds. Nebula then breaks the crest on Yondus head to knock him out. Ego brings everyone to the planet that literally lives through him, as Ego is a Celestial and his consciousness is the core of the planet. Mantis and Drax form a bond, though Drax continues to remind Mantis that he finds her hideous, but that it is a good thing because he thinks he is hideous as well and still managed to find someone else that loved him for who he is. Mantis sees that Ego has Peter wrapped around his finger now that he knows about his own powers. She rushes to wake up Drax to warn him that Egos true intentions are now clear. Rocket starts to gloat that he wants to save Peter just to prove hes better than him and can hang it over his head, but Yondu shuts Rocket up by stating how scared Rocket really is and how he puts on the tough guy thing as a facade. Unfortunately, they are also met by a fleet of Sovereigns out to kill them as well. Rocket gives his last spacesuit to Yondu, knowing he cannot save both him and Peter. Nebula sets off to hunt Thanos down herself, but not before reconciling with Gamora.

Name: happy death day
Summarized_Text: Tree goes to her room and sees her roommate Lori Spengler Ruby Modine. Tree wakes up in Carters room at the beginning of the same day. Tree wakes up in Carters room again. She runs to her room and tells Lori that someone is after her. Tree goes through several loops as she goes after her suspects. Tree wakes up in Carters room yet again. Tree prepares herself to go after Tombs. Tree wakes up once more in Carters room. She runs to her room to find Lori, who offers her the cupcake again. Lori comes clean and says this was all because a guy she likes was more into Tree, which Tree thinks is a stupid motive, as well as Lori saying Trees a dumb bitch.

Name: home again
Summarized_Text: Harry is extremely flirty with Alice, and they all end up back at Alices  Harry and Alice make out, but Harry throws up from all the drinking and passes out. Alice begrudgingly agrees  she offers to let the guys stay in the guesthouse, but makes sure to tell Harry that nothing romantic can happen between them. Alice arrives home from a long day working for Zoey and finds Teddy has made dinner and Harry is screening one of her fathers films in the backyard. Alice is hurt, and when Harry comes home, she tells him that shes too old to be crying over a boy and that hes so young hes going to screw up because thats what guys his age do. George, who is starting to get real feelings for Alice, picks her up, and she tells him hes a good guy. Especially Harry, who keeps butting heads with Austen  who can tell something has been going on between him and Alice. Teddy says Alice doesnt want that, and Austen says Alice doesnt know what she wants. George tries to break it up, but Alice and the girls arrive to see Teddy hitting Austen. Austen assumes theyre going to get back together, but Alice tells him shes ready for a divorce, and shes sure. Harry tells him that if he doesnt want to make their movie, they need to go because they have a play to catch.

Name: hostiles
Summarized_Text: Block sets out with a party that consists of Chief Yellow Hawk and his family his grown son Black Hawk, Black Hawks wife Elk Woman, Yellow Hawks daughter Living Woman, as well as Black Hawks young son Little Bear and a small band of soldiers Corporal Woodson a Buffalo Soldier, Lieutenant Kidder a West Point graduate, Master Sergeant Metz who gets his guns back , and Private Philippe DeJardin a young Frenchman. Once away from the fort, Captain Blocker stops their progress and gets down off his horse with a knife in hand. Blocker orders Yellow Hawk to come down off his horse in his native tongue. Yellow Hawk complies, and Blocker offers the old man one of the knives. Meanwhile, Captain Blocker is warned by Yellow Hawk and his son that the Comanche will keep following them and that they are all in danger because the Comanche will not discriminate between the white men and the natives. The group arrives at an army Fort in Colorado, where the wounded Woodson is turned over for medical treatment. One of the rescuers is killed in the struggle. Yellow Hawk responds by saying that he had also lost people. When they arrive at Valley of the Bears, they bury the now dead Yellow Hawk using a traditional native burial scaffold. The man says that he doesnt think she has what it takes to pull the trigger, at which point she shoots and kills him.

Name: hot summer nights
Summarized_Text: In 1991, a sheltered teenage boy comes of age during a wild summer he spends on Cape Cod getting rich from selling pot to gangsters, falling in love for the first time, partying and eventually realizing that he is in over his head.

Name: i tonya
Summarized_Text: Tonya meets Jeff at the age of 15. LaVona shows up and naturally criticizes Tonya for marrying Jeff. Jeff became even more abusive, and Tonya would maintain her focus on skating to the point that she leaves Jeff. This leads Tonya to go speak to LaVona at the restaurant where she works, as she believes LaVona cursed her, though she tells Tonya that she made her a winner. A cop comes to tell Tonya and Jeff that someone called in a death threat against Tonya, saying she will get a bullet in the back if she competes. In retaliation, Jeff goes to Shawn to try and send phony death threats to Tonyas competition to scare them. Later on, Tonya qualifies to go to the Olympics. Fourtyeight hours after that, the same agents that questioned Tonya and Jeff go to Shawns house to question him, and he pins the blame entirely on Jeff. Tonya continues to compete while Jeff, Shawn, Derrick, and Shane are arrested and brought to trial. Although Tonya tries to find support and consolation in her mother, LaVona tries to secretly record a confession from Tonya, which she finds out about and sends LaVona out of the house.

Name: it
Summarized_Text: As he looks into the sewer, a pair of yellow eyes emerge. He walks away, but not before licking his palm and smearing it on Bills face.  He encounters demoniclooking children that make him run, but he comes across a dead end. He comes onto his daughter, causing her to run into the bathroom crying. Mike runs over to the Losers side while Vic and Belch run away as Henry is knocked unconscious. The second door traps Richie inside with a room full of clown dolls. The Losers part ways as the other boys are too terrified to keep going. They climb down a rope, but before Mike can head down, Henry shows up and attacks him. He realizes that Georgie truly is gone.

Name: it comes at night
Summarized_Text: Paul gets ready as the assailant tries breaking the door open. It is a man named Will Christopher Abbott. Will tells Paul not to shoot the man, but he does. Paul then asks if Will knew the men, but Will didnt. He startles her at first but they sit to have a conversation since they cant sleep. Everyone looks in the kitchen and finds Stanley bleeding and weak. Travis hears the gunshot and starts crying. When asked, Andrew says he doesnt remember getting out of bed. After Paul dumps Will, Will gets up and starts attacking Paul. He ends up killing Andrew first.

Name: jigsaw
Summarized_Text: Halloran takes out his gun just as Edgar pulls the trigger. Ryan and Mitch follow suit while Carly gets cut from behind. The chains start to pull the four up toward the ceiling to hang them until Carly takes a needle. Logan and Eleanor inspect the body and see another jigsawshaped flesh chunk missing. After Kramer leaves, Anna rushes to get the shotgun to kill Ryan. Logan and Eleanor head over to the barn, only for Halloran to find them. Logan and Halloran both wake up in a basement with devices around their necks that are rigged with laser cutters. The lasers appear to kill Logan, and Halloran thinks he is free, until he is pulled to the back of the wall, with the lasers activating on his device. The bodies that were found identical to Carly and Mitch were other criminals that Halloran let go. In fact, one of the criminals he let go was Edgar, who killed Logans wife.

Name: john wick chapter 2
Summarized_Text: John goes to the Continental hotel to meet with Winston Ian McShane to discuss the marker and what Santino has requested of him. John explains the marker that Santino called on him to kill his sister. As John is heading back to New York City, Santino puts out a 7 million contract to kill John. Two men in the subway try to kill him, and John brutally kills them with a pencil. Cassian finds John as he gets on the subway and fights him in the train. John leaves Cassian on the subway. John finds Santino in the lounge. Still, John kills Santino, shooting him in the head. John tells Winston to let everyone know that if they go after him, he will kill them all. John leaves as Winston puts the word out.

Name: jumanji welcome to the jungle
Summarized_Text: They are subsequently attacked by Van Pelts men on motorbikes, but manage to escape by fleeing through the trees and jumping off a cliff into a river. Fortunately, before they are attacked, they discover their next clue hidden in a basket containing a snake, which the team are able to acquire by pooling their skills and coming together, allowing Spencer to catch the snake while Fridge defangs it. When Van Pelts forces attack, Spencer attempts to fight them off, but they are soon confronted by Van Pelt himself, only just escaping when another player uses a smoke grenade as a distraction and leads them to a secret passage. There is a brief panic when damage to the helicopter traps it in a canyon in front of a rampaging herd of white rhinoceros, but Spencer is able to repair the damage and help them ascend. As they prepare for their next step, Spencer and Martha admit that they have feelings for each other in the real world, while Bethany begins to bond with Alex. Van Pelt attempts to gain the advantage by taking Bethany hostage, but Fridge is able to drive the jaguar guards away by befriending an elephant, only for the players to lose the gem when it is thrown away. While the others distract Van Pelts minions, Spencer takes the bike to the top of the statue while Martha retrieves the gem from a pit full of snakes, using her characters weakness to venom to sacrifice her second life and respawn in a position where she can pass the gem to Spencer as she falls. With this action, Spencer places the gem in the statue and calls out Jumanji!, ending the game and restoring the jungle to peace. With this victory, Nigel appears to congratulate the group, shaking their hands and returning them to the real world.

Name: jungle
Summarized_Text: The group says their goodbyes to the villagers and head back into the jungle on their way to see the lost tribe. Unsure of what to make of the situation Yossi knows someone must go find their guide so he heads into the jungle to find Karl. Right away Kevin knows he will stick to the river and Yossi, who is still eager for adventure wants to continue on with Kevin, but knows that Marcus will want to come and at this point, he feels that Marcus is too soft and might spoil their adventure. Yossi initially proposes that Marcus must take the raft due to the condition of his feet, but since they cannot let Karl go on alone, Yossi will go with him. Relieved, Yossi agrees to go with Kevin and for Marus and Karl to continue on foot. They split up the supplies they have left, which Karl insisting Kevin and Yossi take more than half as on the river they wont be able to hunt and Karl and Marcus can also restock at the local village they had passed through before. He and the local, Tico, are still on the river looking for Yossi. The two pull their boat to the riverbank and Tico says they must head back as their small boat cannot continue further upstream against the rapids. The two men help Yossi into the boat as they head back to the village. Then a picture of Tico, Kevin, and Yossi two days after the rescue.

Name: justice league
Summarized_Text: He attempts to take the Mother Box, prompting the Amazons to fight back. Diana goes to find Bruce. As Bruce and Diana walk away, Cyborg is watching them nearby. Cyborg initiates the attack against Steppenwolf while The Flash, scared at first to get involved in combat but inspired by Batman, takes Steppenwolfs hostages to safety. Water from Gotham City Harbor floods in. Diana disagrees with the plan for fear that Superman may come back the way Zod came back as Doomsday. Bruce tells them he has a backup plan in case Superman becomes violent and uncontrollable after his resurrection. He still feels overwhelmed after being brought back to life, but Lois convinces him that the other heroes and the rest of the world need him. He hears the panicked voices of nearby civilians and rushes off to help them, guiding The Flash to the family that was attempting to flee the site. Enraged, Steppenwolf tries to finish them off himself, but Superman uses his ice breath to freeze Steppenwolfs ax, allowing Diana to shatter it with her sword.

Name: king arthur legend of the sword
Summarized_Text: He tells Arthur who his father was and how he is able to wield the sword. The Mage hides and uses her powers to summon hawks to attack Vortigerns men while Bedevere and his men help Arthur get away. Bedevere tells Arthur they need his help in defeating Vortigern, but Arthur refuses to help them. Arthur and the rebels plan to meet with barons from other kingdoms to have them on their side to confront Vortigern. After asking where Arthur and the sword are at, Arthur runs in to get Blue out of there. As Arthur picks up Blue, Blue watches Vortigern kills his father and Arthur takes him away. Through a negotiation, the Mage is released when Arthur goes to turn himself and the sword in to Vortigern. Arthur then sees the vision of Uther before his death, with Arthur standing before his father. Before the sword hits Uther, Arthur grabs it, and Uther tells him it is time for him to wield Excalibur. Arthur continues the fight and tells Vortigern that everything that has brought Arthur to this moment is all thanks to Vortigern himself, due to his actions instigating Arthur to come fight.

Name: kingsman the golden circle
Summarized_Text: Using a device called alpha gel, they were able to keep Harry alive using nanomites that repaired the damaged tissue, but also left him with retrograde amnesia. Harry is given special glasses since he is missing an eye after getting shot. Eggsy and Whiskey ride a skyway up to the factory where Eggsy manages to swipe a vial of antidote before being spotted by Charlie and Clara. Charlie chases after him, but he and Whiskey get away. Before they can get closer, Eggsy steps on a land mine. The guards outside the main gate see Merlin as he goes out singing his favorite song, Take Me Home, Country Roads. At the same time, Elton manages to kick some ass by fighting Poppys goons while dressed in a fabulous feathered outfit. Harry and Elton manage to destroy one robodog with a bowling ball. Harry then outruns the last robodog and kills it by pouring molten gold on it. She refuses to give up the codes until Eggsy sticks her with a needle filled with her tainted heroin.

Name: kodachrome
Summarized_Text: Set during the final days of the admired photo development system known as Kodachrome, a father and son hit the road in order to reach the Kansas photo lab before it closes its doors for good. , The film is based on A. G.  Sulzbergers 2010 New York Times article For Kodachrome Fans, Road Ends at Photo Lab in Kansas about a father and son who take a road trip to Kansas in order to develop photographs at Kodaks last Kodachrome lab before it closes its doors forever.

Name: kong skull island
Summarized_Text: Mills is pulled up by the webbing, and the rest of the soldiers start cutting its legs off. Still alone, Chapman walks through the forest and sits on a log. Shortly after riding away, Nieves is snatched up by carnivorous birds and torn apart midair. The groups continue their battle with the Skull Crawlers plus a wave of the carnivorous birds. However, Packard lures Kong toward him and ignites the fuel along the water, singeing and burning Kongs fur. The survivors then head toward the shore as the main Skull Crawler pursues them. Kong grabs the Skull Crawler and hurls him into the wall, accidentally knocking Weaver into the river. Kong then places Weaver down next to Conrad before leaving. In the distance, Kong keeps a lookout to continue protecting his territory. He then sits down to watch a Cubs game with a hot dog and a beer.

Name: lady bird
Summarized_Text: They meet up with Kyle and other friends in a parking lot where they like to hang out. Lady Bird is angry at Kyle for lying, but he doesnt seem too concerned about it. Marion goes to pick her up, and Lady Bird starts crying. She is disappointed at being rejected for most colleges due to her averagetopoor grades, but she becomes excited when she is told she is on the waiting list for a New York college. They decide they want to ditch prom altogether and go somewhere else. Lady Bird tells Kyle to drop her off at Julies house. Julie also tells Lady Bird she may not see her for the summer because shes going to stay with her divorced father who lives far away. While at lunch with her family, Danny passes them and accidentally lets it slip that Lady Bird is on a waiting list for the NY school, despite her telling her family she was going to University of Davis to stay close to home. Her parents take her to the airport, and Marion is still not talking to her. She runs tearfully into Larrys arm, assuring her that Lady Bird will return.

Name: leatherface
Summarized_Text: As Verna arrives to protect her sons, Hartman quickly takes Jed into his custody as revenge, sending him to a mental asylum for disturbed youths. Sheriff Hartman arrives on the scene with Deputy Sorrel Finn Jones and discovers that one of the group is in fact the teenage Jed and quickly sets off after them. Ike continually insults Bud and is later killed by him. Jackson and Lizzy find Bud sleeping on Ikes corpse and quickly take him away. As a Deputy passes, Lizzy screams out only to inadvertently get Bud killed. Sorrel visits Verna and reveals to her that Hartman has her son, Jed, at the old barn where Betty was killed and Hartman had Jed taken away. Verna has Sorrel killed and fed to the pigs and heads to the barn to save her son. In the barn, Jackson is revealed to be alive and Hartman reveals to a horrified hostage, Lizzy that Jackson is in fact Jed. Verna arrives and has Hartman incapacitated. She gifts Jed his original chainsaw and Lizzy watches on in horror as Jed bisects Hartman, killing him.

Name: life
Summarized_Text: Adams tries to fight off Calvin, but is devoured Calvin escapes through a firecontrol vent. The crew seal themselves in one side of the station and prepare to vent the atmosphere from the other side to render Calvin dormant. Murakami seals himself inside a sleeping pod, while Calvin tries to break inside. The remaining survivors, Jordan and North, speculate that Calvin could survive reentry into Earths atmosphere, so they plan to lure Calvin into one of the ISS two escape pods. Once inside, Jordan will manually pilot Calvins pod into deep space, isolating it and allowing North to return to Earth in the other pod. However, Norths pod is eventually hit by debris, while Jordan is attacked by Calvin. As Norths pod flies in one direction, she records a black box message to warn Earth of Calvins threat. Eventually, one of these two pods lands on the sea and is found by Vietnamese fishermen, while the other pod was knocked away from Earth. What the Vietnamese fishermen finds turns out to be Jordans pod  not Norths.
